1a1(rgyud 'grel): batshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nam mkha' dri ma med pa bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nA ma sang+gI maN+Da la bi d+haM a
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sha bi ra la nA ma/ bong snang du/ mtsha yang dag par brjid
2a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga na mkha'i dri med ces bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dus
2a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum bde gshegs shes rab ngo bo can// ma rig mun nang sems can nyam thag la// ye shes nyi zer sbyin mdzad thugs rje'i
2a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ 'jam dpal de la btud de phyag 'tshal nas// sgyu 'phrul rgya chen na mkha' lta bu nas// dbugs dbyung drug bsdus zab
2b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag ni// dkyil 'khor cho ga dge ba 'di phyogs tsam// bsdus la mos pa'i don du bshad par bya// de la 'dir rdo rje slob dpon sdom pa dang ldan zhing dbang thob pa gzhan la
2b2(rgyud 'grel): phan pa'i blo can zhig gis// nyon mongs pa rags pa'i gang zag la ma smin pa'i smin par bya ba 'am/ sems can thad bde ba la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas tha~Md mnyes par bya
2b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gza' dang nyi ma dang skar ma bzang po la// mkho bi'i yo byad ci 'byor pa bsogs la// nags tshal lam/ ri bo 'am/ chu klung ngam/ cheng tshong la sogs pa nyams dga' bi'i
2b4(rgyud 'grel): gnasu gnas par byas la/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gi sgo dag par byas nas mos pa'i slob ma ma rungs pa/ 'dul ba'i rgyal por gnas par bya ste/
3a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi mtshan ma las byung ba'i khro bo'i gshin rje gshed du skad cig gis bdag nyid gyur te/ sku mdog mthing nag hal pa/ zhal brgya ljags 'dril zhing ha ha hi hi'i gad rgyangs phyogs bcur sgrog pa/ spyan mig dmar po
3a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i mig can/ lag pa brgya po kun bskyod mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ gom pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa mnan pa/ thod pa dang sbrul dang stag lpags kyis brgyan pa/ zhing chen dang glang chen gyi ko rlon gyon pa/ gshin rje gshed po
3a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs thams cad kyi rgyal por bskyed la/ mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil gyi rdo rje sngon po mig 'bras su bsams la/ khro bo'i sdang mig g.yon nas skor bas bgegs thams cad skrag par bya'o// g.yas nas skor bas rdo rje
3a4(rgyud 'grel): raba'o// 'og tu bltas pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'o// steng du bltas pas rdo rje'i gur du bya'o// de'i rjes la gnas der phyag dar dang skyang nul bya zhing / a ka ru nag pos kyang phyogs bcur bdugs la sa gzhi tsan dan la sogs pa'i dris byugs te
3a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su maN+Dal khru gang ba gsum bya ste/ sa de la rin po che brdar zhing 'thas par byas la/ rdo rgyus kyis dkar por bya zhing 'o ma dang tsan dan dang gur+ya kum la sogs pa srog chags la gnod pa ma byas pa las byung ba'i dris byugs la/ yi ge swa
3a6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i rin po che bkram pa ni/ bla ma'i maN+Dal ri rab gling bzhis brgyan pa bkod la/ rang nyid dkon mchog gsum la rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog tshom bu dgod pa dang / yid dam lha'i mot+pal gyi dkyil 'khor lo grangs dang mnyamra
3b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog gi tshom bu bkod la/ rang nyid yi dam lha'i nga rgyal gyi snying kha nas sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba bkug la maN+Dal la bcug ste/ bzhugs pa'i rten dang / mkho ba'i yon du byin gyis brlab po// de'i rjes la
3b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga dang / yan lag gis mchod pa g.yas dang g.yon du bkram la/ gtsang zhing dag par bshams te/ tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la gzhag par bya'o// de nas tshogs bsag pa'i yul dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mdun du mngon par
3b3(rgyud 'grel): sprul te maN+Dal phul la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la// lus dang ngag yid gus ldan nas// kun nas btung de phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags dang // 'jig rten dag pa mchog gyur
3b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dudu rin chen me tog bdug spros sogs// kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi// bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig/ kun nas bsags par gang gyur la// rang bzhin med dang yang tshul gyis// rgyal ba kun gyis spyan sngar bshags// 'gro ba gang
3b5(rgyud 'grel): gis bsod nams gang // dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la// de bzhin mthun pa'i lhag sems kyis// dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo // bde gshegs byang chub mchog bskyed nas// 'gro ba thugs rjes gdul sladadu// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la//
3b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs// yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// 'gro kun yun du bde ba'i phyir// ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol// ji srid 'khor ba gnas par du// bdag gi dge ba de bzhin du// kun nas
4a1(rgyud 'grel): zang par ma gyur par// sems can yongs su smin par shog/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchi// sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas shog
4a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
4a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por bzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// ding nas brtsams te bzung bar bgyi// rdo rje
4a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang // rdo rje slob dpon dam pa dag/ yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong bya la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug du// sbyin pa rnams ni rab tu sbyin//
4a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la// sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa yi// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang ci nus bzung // las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// mchod pa'i las rnams bya ba dang // sdom pa rgya mtsho ma
4a6(rgyud 'grel): lus pa// shin tu dam pa bdag gis bzung // de ltar sdom pa ma lus po// dam pa bdag gis bzung bgyis nas// byang chub mchog sems bskyed bgyis nas// sems can ma rig ldongs pa rnams// bdag gis yang dag dge la gza/ sems
4b1(rgyud 'grel): can nyon mongs bcings pa yi// ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi// sdug bsngal chen po'i nang sems can// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing // 'khor ba
4b2(rgyud 'grel): dag na gnas pa yi// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su// byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar// 'jam mgon 'bangs su bdag 'bul lags// thugs rjes yongs su bzung bar mdzod// dus ni nas ni
4b3(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas su// bder gshegs khyed kyi bka' bzhin du// sems can don du bsgrub lags kyis// byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang //
4b4(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi rjes su dran nas/ da ni ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa stong pa nyid la blo gtang la// de sgrub par byed pa'i tshig brjod de sgra'i don la mos par bya'o// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad//
4b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid // yang dag mtha' l-I yi ge med// chos dab+h+ri sa dam pa bang mi shes// oM swAh+na tsun+ya hA dz+nyA nA badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko hi// zhes brjod pas phyi nang gi bsdus pa'i chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med par gyur te ye
4b6(rgyud 'grel): sakyi sa rgya ni/ sa langs cad mas pa'id kyil sa su seMm kyi snang ba gar mams A yi dang / so'i phreng babs pa'i/ chilas de 'drag / malas chos kyi rgya gnas dan yas
5a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de'i tha ma 'od zer gyi phreng ba lngas bskor ba'i nang du/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba lnga 'phros shing 'dus pa las/ 'od ljang gu las rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan pa/ 'od dmar po las me'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dmar
5a2(rgyud 'grel): pos mtshan pa/ 'od dkar po las chu'i dkyil 'khor rin po ches mtshan pa/ 'od ser po las gser gyi sa bzhi 'khor los mtshan pa/ 'od sngon po las ri rab rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de yang shar shel/ lho bai DUr+ya/ nub pad+ma rA ga/ byang gser rngo
5a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes mtshan pa'o// de'i steng du 'od zer gyi phreng ba lnga ga ril gyis 'dus pa las/ lha'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa sgo khyud rin po che'i ba zas mdzes par brgyan pa/ phyi rol na mu tig gi zar tshags dang dril bu g.yar kha grwa bzhi nas
5a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chun 'phyang kyang rta babs kyi ka ba la 'phyang ba/ rta babs kyang tA ra Na la sogs pas brgyan cing / ri dgas dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang / 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang rin po che 'od du 'bar ba'i tog
5a5(rgyud 'grel): gis mdzes par byas te/ gzhal yas khang gi nang du/ seng+ge dang glang po che dang / rta mchog dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding gi steng du pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i gdan mdzes par bkram pa dang / 'khor rnams kyang go rims su pad+ma dang / zla ba'i gdan bkram
5a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan thog du rang gi sems kyi cho 'phrul las A li kA li'i phreng ba byung ba las/ de'i spro bsdu'i byin rlabs las zla ba dang nyi ma la de dang des mtshan par gyur/ de'i nang du a las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po
5b1(rgyud 'grel): as mtshan par gyur/ de rnams spro zhing bsdus nas 'od 'bar ba las/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa/ gnyis pa lho/ gsum pa nub/ bzhi pa byang ngo // phyogs bzhi ga na phyag gnyis
5b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'i steng na rdo rje dkar po rtsa lnga pa skyes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de'i thugs kar yi ge d+hIHlas/ dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas bzhi na shes rab kyi ral gri/ g.yon bzhi na
5b3(rgyud 'grel): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti yod pa/ zhal bzhi phyogs dang mthun pa/ dbus dmar ser ro// de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa la/ gsang sngags rgyal po drug gis mtshan pa/ de'i dkyil du 'jam dpal ye shes sems
5b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' zhal drug phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas ral gri g.yon po ti 'dzin pa/ de'i steng du zla ba dang / a bsgom par bya'o// de ltar na da ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting 'dzin no// / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo drug bskyed par 'dod pas/ de bzhin
5b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di a las spro bar bya'o// a A i AM u U e AM oM o ai A~M/ s+thi to hri di dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM/ bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ t+yA d+hA bar tI tAM/ oM badz+ra tIk+ShA ya ta~M na maHoM duHkhats+tshe nga ya
5b6(rgyud 'grel): namaHoM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mu ra ta ya~M ya te na maH/ oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na ma/ oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na ma oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH/ oM sarba d+har+m+ma b+hA ba/ swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha/ tsuk+Sha badz+ra/ a A aM a/ pa kr-i ti/ pa ri shu d+ha/ sarba d+har+m+ma ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga
6a1(rgyud 'grel): ta dz+nyA na kA la/ many+tsa shrI/ bA ri shrAd+b+ha trI/ ma pA dA le tAM/ oM a A/ sarba d+ha thA ga tAd+h+waM drA yA/ hA ra ha ra/ au hU~M d+hIHb+ha ga bAn/ dzA nA n+ta r+yAt+ti/ brAg+h+nAM sh+tsa rA/ ma hA ba tsa/ sarba d+har+m+ma ga gA na/ a mA l+yA smA ba ri shud+d+ha/
6a2(rgyud 'grel): d+har+b+ba d+ha na rjod pas mang 'di rnams 'du bar dang sa nam rjeg mas pa pa bris pas/ ma segs pa / sa ma/ ra
6a3(rgyud 'grel): rji rje skin tshur 'dus pa lhas/ gdun rnams kyi snying du yi ge a 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa de gnas pa las/ de rnams las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'di lta ste/ shAr phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma las sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal gcig
6a4(rgyud 'grel): phyug gnyis pa/ sa gnon gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstong pa/ g.yon dril bu dkyu la gtang ba'o// g.yas ngos su rdo rje rgyal po mdog ser za
6a5(rgyud 'grel): tho ba thogs pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa dmar po mnga' 'gengs pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje legs pa ljang gu rdo rje 'dzin pa/ se gol gyi legs pa ster bya'o// lho phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan ser po zhal gcig
6a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ mchod sbyin rin po che bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje rin chen ser po g.yas rin po che rdo rje dpra la bar bstod pa g.yon dril bu dkur brten pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma sngon po nyi ma 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu
6b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbang po dmar po rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po sa shing gi phreng ba thogs pa'o// nub phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ mnyam gzhag gi thog na pad+ma dmar po
6b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje chos dmar po pad+ma'i sdong bu snying gar kha phye ba 'dzin pa'o// g.yos su rdo rje rnon po sngon po ral gri thogs pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu ser po 'khor lo can no// g.yon du rdo rje smra ba sngon po lce thogs pa'o//
6b3(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas don yod grub ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa skyabs sbyin mdzad cing rgya gram can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje las ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje srung ba ser po
6b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khrab thogs pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po che ba thogs pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ser po rdo rje thogs pa'o// de nas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen sems dpa' dang / pad+ma sems
6b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang / las kyi sems dpa' dang / rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' bsgom mo// de'i phyi rol mtshams bzhin sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin pa dang / phreng ba ma ser mo/ rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / glu ma sngon mo pi bang 'dzin pa dang
6b6(rgyud 'grel): gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin pa dang / de rnams shar lho nas brtsams te bsgom mo// gru mang bzhi la spos me ma dkar mo spos phor thogs pa dang / me tog ma mthing ga me tog 'dzin pa dang / mar me ma dmar mo mar me thogs pa dang / dri chab ma
7a1(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ta 9 bu thugs pa dang / darnams blang ga/ bcomamams nas drim bzhin no// da gyuros kyi khyam nam byams pa dang / mthong ba don yo dang / ngan+ya stong kun 'dzin dang / mya ngan kun 'ams rnams ni
7a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar po rdo rje thogs pa rnams ni shAr du'o// spos kyi blo gros dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam pa'i mdzod dang / ye shes rnyog dang / de rnams ni mngon ser po rin po che'i snye ma thogs pa rnams ni lho ru'o// 'od dpag med dang zla
7a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang / bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni mdog dmar po pad+ma'i sdong bu thogs pa rnams ni nub du'o// rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kun tu bzang po rnams ni mdog ljang gu rgya gram thogs
7a4(rgyud 'grel): pa byang du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po lcags kyu thogs pa'o// lho'i sgor na rdo rje zhags pa ser po zhags pa thogs pa'o// nub
7a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgor lcags sgrog dmar po lcags sgrog thogs pa'o// byang gi sgor rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang nag dril bu thogs pa'o// sgo ba de rnams kyang cung zad khro ba/ zhal mche ba lhag ga brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor drug
7a6(rgyud 'grel): par kun tu bsgoms pa la mchod pa'i lha mo dang bskal bzang che mthun pa'i 'khor la dbus kyi rnam snang chen po dkyil ma rnam rnye dang byang chu nga rjenas pa garnas pa'i rnam// de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes kyi 'khor gyi lha tshogs par snang la
7b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa spyan drang bya ba ste/ oM a A sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra hA ra/ oM hUM hriH/ b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUr ti pU gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa sarba d+har+m+ma/ ga ga na a ma la su pa nI shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha A/ la/ badz+ra sa ma ya dzaHzhes
7b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum brjod cing / sngags mjug badz+ra dri sh+ya zhes bya bas ye she spyi dkyil 'khor legs par blta bar bya'o// de'i rjes la phyag btsal te/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod // yi kyi sgo phye la/ dzaHhUM baM ho// zhes brjod cing
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi nas tshur spyan drang la/ bgegs bslang la yid kyi sgo bcang la/ rdo rje'i go chas gsungs la lha so so la bstim la dbang bskur thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi yum bzhin na mkha' la bsdu bar bya'o// ye shes kyis bdud rtsis dbang bskur
7b4(rgyud 'grel): te dbang rtags spyi bor mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ni shar du bstan par bsgoms la bdag nyid lus gnyis kyi tshul du gzung ste/ lha snam la gnas te rdzas kyi mchod pa lnga phul la sgeg mo la sogs pa
7b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis mchod de/ rdo rje sems pas bsdus pas na/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa// rdo rje las kun mdzad pa'o// oM badz+ra satwa su saM g+ha ha zhes bya ba la stsogs pa'i sngags dang grwar dang glu dang bcas pas dbul lo//
7b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag me tog spos// mar me snang ba byug pa dri// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// oM badz+ra d+hU pe d+hu/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe pu/ oM badz+ra a lo ke hrIH/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he gan zhes pas mchod //
8a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang gsang ba'i yum bzhis mchod de/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen
8a2(rgyud 'grel): po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// satwa badz+ra hUM/ rat+na badz+ra hUM/ d+har+m+ma badz+ra hU~M/ zhes mchod la bstod/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud ces
8a3(rgyud 'grel): pa nas// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// ces pa'i bar gyis bstod pa'i rgyal po des bstod la/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo lo sems gtad pa'i yid kyis gsang sngags rgyal po 'di drug bzlas par bya'o// oM badz+ra tIk+Sha duHbats+tshe da prA dz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/
8a4(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na kA ya/ bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maHzhes bzlas par bya'o// de ltar lha bskyed cing gsol ba btab la gnas pa de dkyil 'khor rgya lnga ba mchog ces bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan
8a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod la 'gro ba'i don du phrin las la sbyar te/ dkyil 'khor chen po drug 'jig rten du spro ste phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs bskye nas nyon mongs pa drug sbyangs 'gro ba drug dbugs phyung
8a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor drug gri 'gro ba'i don mdzod na slar snga ma nyid la bsdu zhing spros nas 'gro ba'i don bya'o// de tsam gyis ni las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de lta bu'i cho ga rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod de lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bshags nas dam tshig
8b1(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo bsdu zhing chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rgyas gdab cing bde ba'i spyod pa bya'o// de lta bu'i sbyor bas mtshan ma brtan po byung ba de srid kyi bar du bya ste/ de yang sems rtse gcig tu bsgom zhing zlos pa de la ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
8b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te gshegs nas chos kyi sgo thams cad ston par mdzad sku yang ston to zhes gsungs pas/ zhal mthong ba'am rmi lam du lung bstan pa la sogs pa ma byung gi bar du bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsnyen pa ni bsnyen pa'i
8b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o// de ltar bsnyen pa'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gnang ba thob nas gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ ri dang chu klung dang nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su slob dpon la slob mas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i don du
8b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i go skabs phye ste/ dang po sa'i cho gar yang de bzhin du mnyam pa yin na dbus mtho byang shar gzhol te dma' ba/ sa bzhi 'jam pa nyams dga' ba'i gnasu ngam grog dang bya skyibs dang / bong bu la
8b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa med pa 'jam zhing lhan stug pa der dkyil 'khor brtsig pa 'am bri ba'i don du sa'i bdag po la gnang ba thob par byas la/ so'i lha mo la gtor ma phul la/ dngos grub rab 'bring thob pas brkos nas lhas rtags la mi shis pa yin na bar
8b6(rgyud 'grel): chang 'byung bas dor bar bya'o// shis pa yin na de'i phyogs thams cad byi dor bya ste spos chus chag chag btab la shin tu ba lang gi lci bas byug la 'thas par bcags te mnyam pa me long gi ngos ltar byas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas sa la gtug
9a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM badz+ra me di ni badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA badz+ra d+hU/ zhes pas rdo rje'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlab po// de'i phyogs kun kyang a ka ru nag pos btul zhing ngu bas 'dug go/ de ltar na lhag par gnas pa'i yan lag sa'i cho ga bstan to//
9a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor brtsigs la/ srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la/ ting 'dzin gyis rnam par bsgom ste/ mchod pa rgyas par phul nas bzlas pa bya ste/ mchod pa 'am bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod la/ de nas mdun du
9a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal bya ste/ me tog bkram nas so'i lha mo la mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa bshams te gtor ma yang bshams nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te/ 'di skad bsgo'o// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par
9a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// ji ltar shAkya seng+ge yis// bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde// pham par byas te dkyil 'khor 'bri ces brjod// mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod
9a5(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga dang gtor mu phul la ye shes pa gshegasu gsol lo// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod la/ slob dpon gyis phur bu bcu gshin rje gshed du bskyed la/ dar gyi cod pan dbang bskur la// oM badz+ra kI li kI la
9a6(rgyud 'grel): ya hU~M phaT ces gzi brjid bskyed la bzhago// de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi lho rnams rang gi snying gar bcug la langs te/ rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol la/ 'di skad ces bsgo'o// hUM ye shas zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // sku'i cha byang za byed chus
9b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stabs// gsung ni nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba yis// bgegs gsum dbang du sdung la phyag 'tshalo// hUM bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro bo'i rgyal po bskyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// nyi zla 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis//
9b2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kun bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM rang bzhin rnam dag dbyings las thugs rje chen por sprul// skye med dang las 'jigs byed chen po'i sku bstan te// gdug po 'dul phyir thugs dam mi 'gyur zhing // khro rgyal gshin rje
9b3(rgyud 'grel): gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i// lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig/ gnas 'dir bde gshegs dkyil 'khor pho brang 'bri// bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin byer bar gyis//
9b4(rgyud 'grel): gal te nga'i bsgo ba las 'das nas// ye shes can gyi rdo rje rab 'bar bas// mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// he sa phyogs bgeg gnas che ge mo 'di ru// bdag rdo rje slob dpon che ge mo zhwa byas
9b5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma che ge mo zhes bya bas rngo Da pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thaMd bde ba la dgod par bya ba'i phyir na mkha' dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thams cad bsdus pa zhig 'dri bas/ dus di ring bgegs kyi tshogasu gyur pa
9b6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gdon dang klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang gnod sbyin dang / namapar brdzing rgan po dang rgan mo la sogs pa thams cad dengs shig/ byer zhig song zhig/ gang mi 'gro ba de ni rdo rje ye shes rab tu 'bar ba 'dis/ mgo bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par gyur
10a1(rgyud 'grel): re/ \u0f7frdo rje hUM ste hUM hUM hUM zhes pa dang / hrIHSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na sarba big+h+nA na uts+tshu Ta ya hUM phaT ces bgegs bskrang ngo // spyan mig bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis kyang bsreg par bya'o// khro bo'i stang stabs gom pa'i
10a2(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyis gar byed pas kyang bgogs bskrang par bya'o// de bzhin rdo rje 'gros kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tha ma lan gsum bskor bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rab dang gur dang / dra ba rnams byas la phur bus btab la bzhag go// de nas
10a3(rgyud 'grel): tsan ngan dang pa'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ lha rnams kyi rten dri'i thig le dang / me tog gi tshom bu rnams bkod la/ rnam snang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i snying ga nas dkyil 'khor bton la mdun du dgod par bya'o// de rnams la ye
10a4(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyi mchod la gzhug par bya'o// de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir lha mo bzhis bsdus la dbang bskur te/ rgyas btab la mchod pa byas te/ bsgom bzlas brtsam mo//
10a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rdzogs pa dang mchod pa dang bstod pa rgyas par byas la/ snyun gsan dbab pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'i tsha lo// slob mi rnams la rtse ba dang / khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// rdo rje can
10a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag 'di zhes pas// nang par dkyil 'khor bzang po'i mtshan// 'di zhes bya ba 'bri lags na// rjesu brtse ba nyer dgongs nas// kun gyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// lha lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas bum pa bzang po nag nog med pa'i tshul dang
10b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa lha grangs dang mnyam pa'am/ yang na bum pa bdun gu gul gyis bdug cing / bgegs bskrad cing bsangs te/ dri'i thig le dang mtshan ma bkod la/ rin po che lnga dang / sman lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / snying po lnga dang / spos lnga dang /
10b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser gyi 'o ma dang / srog chags med pa'i chus bkang la/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul bcings te/ 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan la bzhag ste/ nang du lha thams cad bskyed pa dang / las thams cad par gshin rje
10b3(rgyud 'grel): gshed po bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod cing dbang bskur la phreng sngags dang gsang sngags rgyal po drug bzlas la bzhag go// bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas sgrub pa po'i g.yas ngos gzhung dang mthun pa'i
10b4(rgyud 'grel): thab khung byas la/ las dang mthun pa'i shing dang rdzas bsags te/ me lha mngon du mchod la de'i snying gar dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs mchod rdzas phul la/ thun mong du mchod nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngar gyi gnas su
10b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs te/ brtan par byas la/ sngar me lha la rdzas lhag mas mchod / 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab nas me lha gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// de nas ci 'byor pa'i gtor mas chos skyong rnams la tshim par byas la/ 'dod ba'i
10b6(rgyud 'grel): don la phrin las bcol la slar gnasu btang ngo // gtor ma dang sbyin sreg lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas snod du rung ba'i slob mas maN+Dal byas la/ me tog bkram nas me tog gis snying pa bkang nas/ slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya
11a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon pa chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de ni sprul du gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol//
11a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa che na po'i grong khyer du// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal zhes brjod do// slob dpon gyis de la 'di skad ces bsgo ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
11a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / de bzhin gang du ma byon dang // da ltar bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs kyis// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med nyid// gsang sngags spyod
11a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bla med de// skyob pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzang ba// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu'i blo gros 'di kyis shig ces brjod do// de nas phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa
11a5(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa kun bya ba dang / sems bskyed cing sdom po bsrung du bcug la// yi dam gang 'dod ltar bskyed la byin gyis brlab ste/ mchod pa lngas mchod la/ so shing dor ba dang / srung srung bcing po dang / byams pa'i go
11a6(rgyud 'grel): bskon la/ dbu'i gtsug tor bskyed de/ rmi lam brtag pa'i phyir ku sha byin la/ zab cing rgya tshe'i chos bshang lo// slob dpon gyi las rnams rdzogs par bya'o// slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus te/ go skon
11b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs te ci bder gnas par bya'o// de nas nang par nyi ma 'char khar rdul tshan gyi dkyil 'khor byed pa 'dod pas/ ba'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs te/ tsan dan gyi lde gu dri dang ldan par byas la/ thig spyad sar pa nyos 'gyur tsha
11b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo'i nyi shu cha kha dog lnga pa rin po chu'i snod du bcug la/ byin gyis brlabs la mchod la// sna slob ma'i lag tu gtang la bsgril nas// 'jig rten khams 'di ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas le sogaso 'gro mgon gyi// khyed kyi dus ni 'di
11b3(rgyud 'grel): lags kyis// bcom ldan rdo rje'i thig gdab gsol zhes brjod la// bdag dang slob ma g.yas nas skor bas thig gdab par bya'o// tshangs thig dang po shwar nas nub du gang ba// gnyis pa byang nas lho ru gdab// slob dpon me lhar
11b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas slob ma dbang ldan du gAnas te/ shar gyi thig dang de bzhin du log gsum du gad ba/ de rjes tshangs thig dang / zur thig dang thig tshan dang/ thig phran gyi bye brag gis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi gling ngam lngar thig gdab
11b5(rgyud 'grel): po/ de yang steng du ye shes kyi thig dang / 'og tu dam tshig gi thig ste/ sa thig rlan gyis sbyangs la tshul ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pas dpyad la gdab par bya'o// de'i rjes la gser las byas pa'i rin po che lnga'i phye ma ji ltar byin gyis
11b6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs la/ mchod pa phul la bstims te/ tshon dgye ba ni dkar po chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes haM/ sngon po me long lta bu'i ye shes nyid// ser po so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la// dmar po mnyam pa nyid ye shes nyid// ljang gu bya ba grub
12a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye sheso// ye shes lnga ldan dkyil 'khor 'grub ces brjod la// sngon la slob dpon gyis byang shar mtshams kyi rtsig pa brtsigs la/ phyi nas slob mas skor phyogs ma log pa'i ci bde ba tshon dgye bar bya'o// de la
12a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po gtso bo'i gnas rnams ni// nyi ma'i 'od la zla bas brgyan pa'o// gzhan dag ni phyogs kyi kha dog go/ 'dod yon pad+ma ra ga'i sa gzhi// rin chen pha gu gser las byas pa la/ rin po che'i phreng ba bkye ba la/ dra ba dra phyed na mkha'i mdog
12a3(rgyud 'grel): can mu tig gi har 'phyang ba de'i phyi rol du na mkha'i mdog la zla bas ka ba dang rta babs dang ri dgas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / rgyan rnams ci mdzes par bri bar bya'o// de dag ni rgyab tu rdo rje dang / me 'od kyi phreng ba bri bar bya'o//
12a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lnga'i bar bar ni// gser gyi sa gzhi la rin po che gcal du bkram par bya'o// de'i phyi rol gru bzhir byas la grwa bzhi la dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bris zin nas/ lhag
12a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang chad pa bskang ba'i phyir dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya pa bzlas la/ tha ma lan gsum bskor bar bya'o// de nas dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas la/ mchod pa'i bye brag me tog gi snod dang / spos phor dang dri'i snod dang mar me'i phreng ba dang
12a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal zas kyi snod stong ngam brgya 'am bcu la sogs pa ci 'byor pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa ci 'byor pa bsags nas/ slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi shar du stan bde ba la gnas te/ cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad
12b1(rgyud 'grel): bsogs te/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis lhag par gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor snying ga nas sprul nas/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang bsres nas tshogs bsags pa sngon du 'gro bas
12b2(rgyud 'grel): srung ba'i 'khor lo'i skabs su phur pa dang / mnga' dang ral gri la sogs pa'i re bas bskur te/ sngon du gsungs pa'i tshul du rgyas par bsgoms nas mcho de/ bum pa yang bkod la dbang bskur zhing rgyas btab la/ rdzas kyi mchod pa lnga dang / phyi nang gi mchod pa
12b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang / gsang ba'i yum bzhis kyang legs par mchod la/ gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rol mo'i bye brag thams cad kyang dbul bar bya ste/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' tshan rol mo chen po ste// bkur bsti rim gro
12b4(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs// mchog tu dga' ba grags pa'i dpal// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phreng sngags dang / oM dang hUM bzlas pa 'am/ lha re re zhing re re dbul bar bya'o//
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho 'di// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// bdug pa'i snod du ma dang / me tog gi snod du ma dang /
12b6(rgyud 'grel): byug pa'i snod du ma dang / mar me'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas so so'i sngags dang / gar dang bcas pa dbulo// yid bzhin nor bu chen po dang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa dang // bum pa bzang po che
13a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mchog/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul// ci bde bar nI bzhes su gsol// oM dang hUM bzlas te/ so so'i ming spel te/ oM rat+na ye hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas rin po che dang nor bu'i bye brag mang po dang /
13a2(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa mang po dang // bum pa bzang po 'bras bu can gyi shing gis brgyan pa la sogs pa rin po tsha'i bye brag thams cad kyang lha re re zhing dbu'o// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing / nang ngo cog gi dgra che
13a3(rgyud 'grel): ba / 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gzigs pa yis// zug rlu 'byin pa bla na med// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul// 'gro ba'i don du bzhesu gsol// oM hUM zhes zlos shing 'bras bu gsum dang / tsan ngan dang / gur kum dang / ga pun
13a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / dzA ti la srog chags las ma byung ba'i sman ji snyed yod pa de rnams lha re re zhing so so'i ming dang spel la dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mtha' thug pa'i// chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa dang // khyab bdag tshan po rin chen gdum
13a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid 'di// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'dul// 'gro ba'i don du bab su gsol// zhes porjod cing // rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / 'phan dang / gdugs la sogs pa ras sam 'phan mi lnga ldi bsam
13a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa lha re re zhing dbu lo// lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing // gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// namakha' khyab par gar byed pa// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul// 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su
13b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// zhes brjod cing / gar gyi rnam pa glog ltar bsgyur cing gzugs brgya stong du ma snyeng du sprul la/ gar byed cing dkyil 'khor la dbu'o// de'i rjes la sbyin sreg gi cho gas mchod cing // mchod pas kyang lha tshogs mnyes par bya bar
13b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung so// de nas dkyil 'khor la gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste/ sngar sdom pa blangs pa'i slob ma nges slob dpon la gsol ba btab nas/ de nas slob ma de la bgegs bsgreng nas/ a ga
13b3(rgyud 'grel): ru nag pos bdugs la// oM badz+ra rak+Sha hUM/ zhes pa'i don bzlas pa'i stong g.yogs dang / oM badz+ra lak+Sha hUM zhes bzlas pas gdong ba bkab la/ sgo bzhi'i phyogs nas rigs lnga la phyag 'tshal du gzhug go// de'i rjes la lag na me tog thogs
13b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slob mas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas rgyun bshags pa'o// de nas slob dpon la gsol ba 'di skad gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa'i grong khyer mchog/
13b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// slob dponi bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// zhes brjod par bya'o// slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bya'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pas// gsang ba yong su 'dzin pa ni/
13b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dong ngam// nges kyang 'tshalo zhes brjod par bya'o// de la slob dpon gyis rigs lnga'i sdom pa rig pa'i dbang lnga'i rten du rung bar bya ba'i phyir phog le/ gzhan yang mi dge ba bcu dang / nye ba'i las kyang spang ba'i sdom pa
14a1(rgyud 'grel): des kyang slong dpon gyi sdam pa gsungs pa ltar// kho bo yang bsrung zhing sdom par bgyi'o zhes khas blangs long cig/ de dang mthun par sngar gsungs pa ltar khas blang bar bya'o// de nas dbang bskur ba'i gsol pa slob mas gdab pa
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas ni// slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba// mi rtog 'khor lo sbyin par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ dkyil
14a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen por zhugs nas kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur te// skal ba chen po bdag la gsol// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas gdab cing // dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag
14a4(rgyud 'grel): la gsol// zhes gsol pa gdab pa'o// slob dpon gyis kyang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal/
14a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do// de nas lha la gnang ba thos pa dang / snang gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM sarba lo ga bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA dA yA mI/ su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badz+ra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM zhes snying gar zla ba rdo rje bsams la/ lag pa nas khri hUM/ dzaHhUM baMHho zhes bya ba sgo ba'i nas
14a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go// de nas shar gyi sgor phyogs par bzhag la// rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigasu thugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang yin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
14b1(rgyud 'grel): cadu yang 'grub pa thob nas dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis// khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig/ ngam chug nyams par gyur ta ra zhes brjod de// de nas
14b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la// rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag gzhug par mdzad// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma dag tu dral du gshegs// oM badz+ro daM ka tha hUM/ 'di de khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na
14b3(rgyud 'grel): sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'grub/ oM a mr-i ta hUM badz+ra gar+b+ha dza tha hUM/ de nas slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgrags te/ nged nas brtsoms te/ khyod kyi rdo rje slob dpon nga yin gyis// nga yis
14b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar gyur ta re/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' dbab par bya ste// 'di skad brjod du gzhu'o//
14b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smos shig po'o// rdo rje dris bsgos pa snying gar bzhag la/ 'di de rdo rje'i tshig ste/ 'jam dpal rdo rje yin
14b6(rgyud 'grel): par grags// rdo rje ye shes bla med ni// deng 'dir khyod la 'bab par shog/ oM ma ny+dzu shrI badz+ra A be sha ya a a oM a zhes nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod do// rdo rje dmar po mtshan gang ba char ltar du 'bebs par bas mo// gal te 'bab bar ma
15a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na sdig pa byang ba'i cho ga byas dbab par bya'o// de nas babs pa dang yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o// de nas me tog phreng ba dor te/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes pas dkyil 'khor la gtor la gang du babs pa'i lha de
15a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ngam du dbog go/ oM pri ti gr-ih+Na traM i maM satwa ma hA ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de mgo la bcing bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te mig lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dbye zhing sngags 'di brjod do// oM 'jam dpal rdo rje de khyod kyi/
15a3(rgyud 'grel): mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// de ring nyid du 'byed par shog/ he badz+ra pa sh+ye hUM zhes brjod la/ mig g.yogs kyang bkrol te 'di skad brjod do// legs par
15a4(rgyud 'grel): ltos shig sems dpa' che// thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// me tog gang la phog pa ni// 'di de khyod kyi rigs kyi lho// rang gi lha ru shes par bgyis// zhes brjod la rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
15a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad chen po'i bar du dkyil 'khor drug bstan par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar ngos sku maN+Dal lA pad+ma 'drab brgyad bris la/ yi dam lha'i gzugasu bsams la dbang bsgyur bar bya ste/ de yang dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur
15a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lho rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar// de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu// dag pa yis ni sku khrus gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje
15b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs 'chang ba/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nasu// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka ha~M/ rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'i// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi/
15b2(rgyud 'grel): sdang chen po mi bskyod pa'o// dpal ldan chu yi dbang bskuro// oM sarba ta thA gA tA badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsi hUM/ de nas cod pan gyi dbang bskur te// phal pa'i sa ni gzhom pa dang // yon tan gzi brdzing bskyed pa'i phyir// nga rgyal rin chen 'byung
15b3(rgyud 'grel): ljin gyis// tsong pon mi ni dbang bsku'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA u mu gu Ta a b+hi Sh+T+r-iny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjod pa dang / dpal ldan rin chen tsong ban dbang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// dang bdag byin gyis brlabs nas// rdo rje rin chen mdzad du
15b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na swa b+hA ba At+ma kro haM/ tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// nga rgyal rin tshan 'byung ldan gyi// cod pan gyi ni dbang bskuro// de nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur te// sad+yas kun gyis rdo rje'i dbang //
15b5(rgyud 'grel): dri ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badz+re sa ma ya s+t+waM/ chos kyi gsung rab dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag
15b6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs na su// rdo rje gsung du mdzad gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM// 'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas kyis// rdo rje yi ni dbang bskuro//
16a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyi kyang ni rtag tu bcang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i mchog tu bshad// oM sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM
16a2(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+dza mi tiSh+Tha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje lasu mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ 'du byed phung
16a3(rgyud 'grel): po rnam dag pa'i// bya ba nan ta na ye shes kyi// phrag dog don yod grub pa yi// dril bu yi ni dbang bskuro// de nas ming gi dbang bskur te// srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug bsngal chen po bsal ba'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i
16a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs// rnam par snang mdzad rtag tu bskyed// oM sarba tA thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi che ge mo nA ma a b+hi She ki ta hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje sku ni mdzad du
16a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa'i// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad kyi// dpal ldan mi bskyod dbang bskuro// de dang ldad na de lnga ni rig pa'i dbang
16a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga ste// phung po lnga dag nas nyon mongs pa lnga spangs nas/ ye shes lnga dang ldan te/ ma rig pa rig pas na rig pa'i dbang lnga zhes bya'o// de nas brtul dbugs kyi dbang zhes bya ba ni/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i lag na
16b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang mi rtag tu bcang // 'jam dpal rdo rje'i brtul ba shugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta many+dzu shrI tsit+ta badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha a b+hi She ka ta ya mo hUM ha ha ha hi hI hiM/ de nas phreng ba sbyin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mi phyeng ba'i//
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// snying po yid bzhin nor bu 'di// skyob pa sngags kyi dbang bskuro// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir/ yon bdag gis yon gyi mchog phul la gsol ba btab la/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas
16b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ ji ltar mchod stsol bgyis pa ltar// bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba// 'gro ba bskyab pa'i gzi brjid can// ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas stsol//
16b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// da ltar gsol ba btab rdzas la sdom pa sbyin te/ ji bzhin don ldan
16b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ni// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// phas pham par ni rab tu grags// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya// srog gcod rku dang 'phrog pa dang // rdzun dang chang ni cung zad spang // mi dge ba bcu po dag/ khyod
16b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi nam yang ma spyod cig/ theg pa dman la mos pa dang // sems can 'khor ba mi spang zhing // mya ngan 'das la ma chags shing // lha dang lha min mnyam mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'gam par bya ba ma yin te// dam
17a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di dag nyams pa na// rdo rje dmyal bar 'tshong bar byed// de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis// des kyang slob dpon gyi bka' bzhin bgyid par 'tshal zhes khas blu // de nas slob ma dam pa de'i lus la sgra bkod la// rnam
17a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bum pa thogs te// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsong ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskuro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba bab+hi dzi ka sa ma ya shri
17a3(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM/ de nas gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i mig thur thogs la/ ji ltar mi mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// rab rab rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+ra nai tra a
17a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ha ra pa Ta laM hri zhes nyon mongs pa spong ba'i dbango // de nas me long bstan la/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung // ngo bo nyid
17a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas med par// de ltar chos 'di shes nasu// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas sra su skye// ye shes kyi dbang ngo // de nas mnga' gzhu blangs la mi'i drung du 'phen du bcug la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med/
17a6(rgyud 'grel): de/ skal ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston// bdud kyi rigs rnams pha ma byed pa'o// ye shes kyi ni mnga' 'phongs shog ho zhes mnga' 'jig rten gyi khams drug tu 'phen du gzhug/ sku'i dbang ngo // de nas dril bu blangs la dkrol te// chos
17b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo rnams nam pa'o mtshan nyid med// mkha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sku mchog mnyam pa nyid gsol// AHzhes gsung gi dbang ngo // me long blangs la 'jam dbyangs rdo rje me lo bzhim/ ngag cing gsal la rnyog ma med// sangs rgyas kun
17b2(rgyud 'grel): bdal rang bzhin ni// bu khyod kyis ni snying la zhugs// many+dzu shrI tsit+ta a/ thugs kyi dbang ngo // de nas rkang pa'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag/ lag par dung dang lce gtad/ mgo la gdug gtad/ de nas brtsams sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor
17b3(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor cig/ di ring phan chad 'jig rten la// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// chos kyi dung ni bla med pas// kun tu ma lus grang bar gyis// som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing // dogs pa myang ba'i sems kyis su// gsang sngags spyod pa'i
17b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang // kun tu khyod la srung bar byed ces brjod do// yang 'jig rten kun la thams cad du// sems can
17b5(rgyud 'grel): kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes brjod do// de nas thams cad gzengs bstod de// kun bdag sangs rgyas bsgom pa po// rdo rje'i ming dbang bskur bas kyang // de bzhin gshegs
17b6(rgyud 'grel): bar lung bstan nyid// oM 'di de ngas khyod lung bstan yin// 'jam dpal rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// srid pa kun tu sgrub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las pa nyeH/ rtse ba 'di gshegs che ge mo zhes bya ba/ sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+yAM b+h+yA N+yA ba
18a1(rgyud 'grel): swaH/ de nas gnang ba sbyin pa// ngo bo nyid kyis sems can rnams// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar chags la sogs// gtsang mas sems can don bya'o// de nas dbugs dbyung ba/ gsang ba mcho gi dkyil
18a2(rgyud 'grel): mo rnyings pa 'dir// di ring phan chad khyad zhugs kyis// sdig pa kun las nges grol bar// khyed rnams ngas ni legs par gnas// bde chen thob pa 'di las ni// slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi smod pa// cis kyang mi 'jig
18a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das// khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid the tsom med par 'thob// de nas bdag nyid thar bsams la// chos gos bzung ste/ oM 'di ltar lung bstan par//
18a4(rgyud 'grel): mgrin gcig tu ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni lung bstan mdzad// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas// kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// rgyal ba'i bdag po ston pa yin// deng ni bdud las rnam
18a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal te// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs// khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid the tshom med par 'thob// de ltar gzengs bstod pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang / lung bstan pa'o// de nas slob ma de la mchod pa lnga dang / sgeg mo la
18a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ khyed rnams kyis kyang dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod cig par bka' bsgo'o// de nas de rnams kyis yo byad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha mchod la/ lhag mas der tshogs
18b1(rgyud 'grel): tshim par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod de/ sgeg mo la sogs pa yis mchod pa bstod do// de nas slob dpon la yon gyis mnyes par byas la// 'dod pa'i don gsol ba gang go// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste/ dkyil 'khor la skor 'phya
18b2(rgyud 'grel): la lha gsheg su gsol te/ dam tshig bsdus la ci bde ba'i spyod lam bya'o// slob ma rnams kyi don gyi phyir// dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa la// dge ba bsags pa gang gyur pa// thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog/ 'phags pa 'jam
18b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig na m-i kha 'dri ma med pa zhes bya ba// 'jam dang lo ba shes gnyen sngo zhal snga nas mdzad brdzogs// / rgya gar mi mkhan po swa b+hA dra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyi
18b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshalo// thams cad mkhyen cing thug su chud// smra ba'i skyes
18b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i seng+ge tshugs pa med// rnam kun mkhyen la phyag 'tshalo// spyod dang ldan pa shes pa'o// 'jam pa'i mgon la dga' ba dang // nga yi don du sgrub pa'i thabs// mdo ru bsdus te bshad par bya// rnam par smon pa'i lus
18b6(rgyud 'grel): dag la// lha yi nga rgyal dran byas te// mdun du 'jam mgon bsams nasu// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang // bshags dang rje su yi rang ba// bsngo dang skya bsu 'gro ba dang // sems bskyed de ni yid kyis bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA sa b+ha
19a1(rgyud 'grel): ba shud+d+ho haM/ brjod pas chos kun dmigs med par// stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya// sems nyid a ru gyur nas su// zla dkyil d+hIHru bsgom par bya// de las 'phro 'dus mtshan mar gyur// man ma 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i
19a2(rgyud 'grel): sku sku gser me tog zur phung can// shes rab ral gri po tis mtshan// zhi bya'i tshul 'tshang gzhon nu bsgom// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcing sna nas su// e h+ye haM many+dzu shrI ku mA r+yA/ A kA rarA ShA A bi sha ya a A/ spyan drang mdun du
19a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// de nas mchod pa dbul byas te// many+dzu shrI gan+d+he pU dza swAhA/ oM many+dzu shrI puSh+pe pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI d+hU pa pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI A lo ke pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI nai bi d+hi pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI gan+d+he swA hA/ de
19a4(rgyud 'grel): nas bstod pa'i tshig 'di brjod// shes rab chen po'i skad cig gis// chos kun khong du chud par mkhyen// mi shes g.yu la ngo thams cad sel// sems can kun la byams thugs ldan// 'jam mgon byams thugs ldan la
19a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// mi shes g.yul sel ral gri dang // shes rab po ti thugs brtags can// chos rnams thams cad ston pa po// skye mched dbyings ston zug rngu spangs// 'jam mgon tshes sku nyid la bstod// yang na 'dod yon lnga
19a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis// mngon par mchod nas bstod pa bya// yang na mtshan nyid bstod par bya// yon tan mtshan gyi bstod ce'o// de nas lus la bsdus byas nas// bzlas pa dag ni bya bar bshad// gnyis su med
19b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i thugs ka ru// rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsam// de yi snying du ting 'dzin sems// nyi ma'i maN+Dal steng du ni// ral gri d+hiHyis mtshan par bsam// de la bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor// oM badz+ra
19b2(rgyud 'grel): tik+Sha du/ bats+tshe / pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mAr+d+ha ya~M/ dz+nyA na kA la bA g+h+ri shwa ra a ra paM tsa nA ya te na maHswAhA/ mi bskyod po'i sems kyis badz+ra pa bya// skyo ba dag ni byung ba na// 'dzin pa meng pa bsgom par bya// thun
19b3(rgyud 'grel): bani dag tu nyams su byung mang na nyin mtshan ri ri'o// tha mar gyi shegs su gsol ba bya// rang nyid lha'i nga rgyas gnas/ 'dzam mgon sgrub thabs legs sbyar bas// bdag gis dge ba gang
19b4(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa// des ni khams gsum sems can kun// 'jam mgon go 'phang thob par shog// slob dpon 'jam dpal
19b5(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / mang le/ bkra shis//
20a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am dpal kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs//
20b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// bag
20b2(rgyud 'grel): chags skyon gyis dri ma'i tha ba la// shes rab bdud rtsi'i char ba 'bebs mdzad pa'i// a ra pa tsa na la gus btud// byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// de la 'dir dug gsum cha mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil
20b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ bla ma gsang sngags la mkhas pa/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pas/ slob ma de skad cig smra ba de bzhin byed pa ma smin pa smin par bya ba'i phyir ri bo la sogs pa dgon pa'i gnasu maN+Dal byas te/ stan bde ba la
20b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas mchod pa bshams nas/ bdag nyid drug po chen po drug shul che ba bdud la sogs pa 'jigs bya chen po yang 'jigs par byeng bar bsams l-i/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas bgegs thams stong bsgyung ngo / sring ba'i
20b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i bgegs thams cad bcom la khregs shing rdo rje chen po'i ri bos bskor te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs sprul te mchod pa chen po phul la bsnam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin lnga gnas nas/ na mkha'i kham su yi ge'i phreng ba snang ba chen pos
20b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar byas la/ mkhas pa byang sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas 'grub par bya ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang / de'i byin brlabs las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / sgyu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs
21a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis don grub par bya ba'i phyir las rgyal mchog dang de rnams bsgom par bya'o// de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor byar rung ba'i sa'i cho ga dang / slob ma snod dang ldan pa la sdom pa phog la dkyil 'khor bris te rgyan rnams
21a2(rgyud 'grel): bkram ste/ lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu can/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'/ g.ya su rdo rje rin cheni/ nub tu rdo rje chos/ byang du rdo rje las rnams bris/ sgeg mo la sogs
21a3(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad dang khyamasu bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / sgo rnamasu rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhag/ dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma bcug la de la dbang bskur bar bya'o// /
21a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu de la yon gyi mchog blangs te lha dang slob dpon la mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya'o// de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bsdus la ci bde bar gnas par bya'o// byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dge
21a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gang des 'gro ba kun// srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal nas// rdo rje sems dpa' thob par shog/ byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho da/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzogasaso//
21a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gA ti maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur ba la phyag 'tshalo// gzhon nur sku
21b1(rgyud 'grel): sbrul me tog thong // sku mdog gser can shes rab ye shes lha// mi shes rgyu gcod ral gri 'dzin// shes drug ye shes phyag 'tshal te// 'jam dpal rang bzhin chos sku ni// nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa la// gdul bya'i dbang gis dkyil
21b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor drug/ bde gshegs rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad/ de la 'dir sems can gyi gti mug 'dul ba'i gnyen por bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa yin te/ de yang gza' skar bzang po la
21b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i khang pa bkra shis par 'jug par bya ste/ dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas la/ sgrub pa'i gnas de yang byi dor legs par byas te spos bzang po yang phyogs bzhir gtul nas maN+Dal la tshul dang 'thun pa'i me
21b4(rgyud 'grel): tog bkod de mchod pa bkram nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnams kyang bkram la stan 'bol ba'i steng du sems can lo phan pa'i blos 'dug ste/ ma rung ba 'dul ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshong po ni skad cig gis rdzogs par
21b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ khro bo gdong drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa/ 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mda' dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / g.yas pa'i phyag na thogs pa'o// thod pa dang / sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / dbyug tau rnams g.yon du thogs pa'o// spyan dmar ba bco brgyad sdang mig dgradang pa/ ljags drug glog ltar 'gyur ba'i zhal nas hUM hUM hUM sgrogs pa/ zhabs drug gis 'gro ba rigs drug brdzis pa/ char sprin gyi
22a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog lta bur bsams la bgegs thams cad bskrad la ji ltar 'dod pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o// de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o//
22a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi'i sangs rgyas a las rnam snang dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya/ de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gnyis pa as mtshan pa/ de'i steng du a las bcom ldan 'das
22a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ye shes dkar po g.yon 'khor lo g.yas ral gri/ thugs kar a las zla ba'i steng na a/ sangs rgyas ngo'i thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams spro bar bzhed pas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a A
22a4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ hA ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUn+ti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA ba tsa sarba d+harma ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+ha du dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHzhes brjod pas/ de 'phros shing 'dus pa las lha rnams kyi gnasu yi ge a
22a5(rgyud 'grel): sha stag du gyur to// a dI las rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go// de'i rjes la mtshan brjod cing bstod de sprul pa'i sku dpag tu med pas gti mug gi gnas sbyangs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa ni
22a6(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal mchog/ de lta bu'i bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor brtsams nas legs par bris nas dgod pa ni/ dbus su rnam par snang mdzad zhal gtso phyag gnyis pa/ shar du sems ma rdo rje/ lho ru rin chen sems ma/ nub du
22b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma sems ma/ byang du las kyi sems ma'o// gru chang la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o// khyams kyi grur ni bdug pa ma la sogs pa bzhi'o// de nyid du bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yang tshul dang mthun pa dgod// sgo bzhir ni sgo ma bzhi
22b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa bris te/ sems can skal pa can dag kyang der zhugs par byas la dbang bskur ba thob pa rang slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la yang ci 'byor pa'i yon phul la slob dpon gyis kyang dbugs dbyung ba
22b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzengs bstod de lung bstan par bya'o// bde bar gshegs mchog dam pa ni// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad dpal// dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa yi// shes pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog/ slob dpon 'jam dpal ba shwe
22b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyen gyis mdzad pa// rnam par snang mdzad dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan
22b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa'i sems can lo// thugs rjes zla ltar bsil mdzad 'jam dbyangs mgon// rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa'i sangs
22b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ni// de la btung de mi bskyod dkyil 'khor bshad// de la 'dir zhe sdang gi gnyen por mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ dbang bskur thob cing sdom pa dang ldan pas// yo byad phun sum tshogs par byas la/ dus bzang
23a1(rgyud 'grel): po la dgon pa 'am nags 'dab du bde bar gshegs pa bsnyen par bya ste/ sa phyogs der maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa bshams la/ sga dgra pa sngon du 'gro bas gshin rje gshed bar bskyed la bgegs thams
23a2(rgyud 'grel): cad tshar gcang la/ srung ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcos pa spyan drang zhing mnyes par byas la/ de'i mdun du sdig pa'i dri ma bkru ba la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed// de nas sdom pa ma lus
23a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzung ba stong zhing bdag med pa la mos shing khang pa yang gzhal zhing brjod du med pa las ye shes kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa las grub pa'i nang du gzhi'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar rdzogs pa'i tshul
23a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sbyor ba dang po dang rigs mthun pa'i sems dpa' thams cad dang sa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'khor du bltas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug po rnams dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba dang / de dang mthun pa'i mtshan brjod
23a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byin brlabs kyis de'i dkyil 'khor dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste/ rang gi las la sbyar bas las rgyal mchog bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa zhes bya'o// de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil
23a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bris te lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa/ de dang rigs mthun pa sems dpa' bzhi ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas bskor bar bkod nas/ de'i phyi rol du sgeg mo la sogs pa bachad dang / khyamasu byams pa dang /
23b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la sogs pa rnams bri'o// sgo bzhir ni sgo srungs dang tshul dang mthun par bzhago/ de ltar legs par bris la mchod pa'i bye brag gis
23b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par mchod nas skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma gzhug cing dbang yang sbyin par bya'o// de'i slar yang nges par mchod nas rigs de nyid kyi mtshan nas brjod pas yang dag par bstod la/ dkyil 'khor la skor ba byas nas lha rnams la bzod
23b3(rgyud 'grel): par gsol/ te dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o// mi bskyod rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// zhe sdang gnyen por gyur nas kyang // 'di la gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// mngon dga'i zhing du skye bar shog/ mi bskyod pa dbugaso dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
23b4(rgyud 'grel): ga slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
23b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la phyag 'tshalo// ma chags spyan mnga' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas// chags mang don rtogs 'dod chags gnas nas dag/ 'jam dpal rnon po de la gus btud de// 'dod
23b6(rgyud 'grel): chags pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad// de la 'dod chags kyi gnyen por sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ snying rje chen po blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ slob ma ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa rdzogs par
24a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir grong khyer la sogs pa'i gnasu nyam nga ba spangs nas the tshom dang dogs pa thams cad spangs nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams nas srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la chos
24a2(rgyud 'grel): sa cad na mkha'i dkyil ltar bltas te/ sems kyi snang ba A li dang kA li'i phreng ba skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i 'od zer lnga yang glog bzhin 'byung ba las 'byung ba chen po bzhis bteg pa'i khang pa'i nang na rang gi gdan yang rma bya las grub pa'i steng du
24a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas nges par hrIHlas byung ba'i sbyor ba ye shes sems dpa'i bar du rdzogs pa dang / de'i byin brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang 'dod
24a4(rgyud 'grel): chags can gyi 'dul ba'i ngor gang la sangs rgyas kyi sku phra mo mang po yang mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par bya'o// de ltar pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar gyur nas 'dod chags can gyi sems can rnams
24a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor yang rtsig pa rdul tshon las bris te/ lha dgod pa ni dbus su sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de la rigs mthun pa'i sems dpa' bzhi dgod / gzhan yang sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyang mdzes par
24a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gram mo// khyam su yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgram mo// sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi bzhag go/ de ltar legs par bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la snang ba thob pa dang / skal ba dang mthun pa'i me tog gis snying
24b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bkang ba'i slob ma bcug la lha rnams bstan cing dbang bskur nas/ de nas yon gyi mchog blangs te dkyil 'khor la phul la lhag ma rdo rje slob dpon gyi longs spyad par bya'o// 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa la
24b2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba bsags par gyur pa nges// snang ba mtha' yas nyid du shog/ snang ba mtha' yas dbugs dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
24b3(rgyud 'grel): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Da NaH bi d+hi nA mabod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo//
24b4(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba'i 'gro ba la// zug rngu 'ubyin mdzad sman pa'i rgyal po mchog/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de btud nas// rin chen rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// de la 'dir ser sna'i gnyer por sangs rgyas
24b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i skyes bu dbang bskur ba thob pas ri bo 'am chu klung du 'byor pa dang ldan par byas te/ dus tshong bzang po la bsnyen pa'i khang par zhugs la shes rab dang
24b6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dang ldan pa'i blos bskyed de/ gangan 'bol ba la 'dug cing 'dun pa'i bya ba byas nas de ma thag tu mi rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po dran par byas le bar chong bsal te/ nam pa'i dbyingasu dkyil 'khor la bltas la/ de'i mdun
25a1(rgyud 'grel): du lus ngag gi dri ma bsal la sems bskyed cing sdom pa blangs nas stong pa nyid dran pa'i dbyings su skar ma lta bu'i yi ge'i phreng ba bltas te/ de las byung ba'i khang pa dang / gzhi'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed pa dang / sbyor
25a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po dang / de dang mthun pa'i sems dpa'i bsgom pa ni a las nges par byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / de rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku spro ba'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par bya'o//
25a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dkyil 'khor la nye bar gyur nas gzhan don du thugs rje shar te/ dkyil 'khor bar chad med pa'i gnas byas la/ rdul tshon ye shes kyi rang bzhin du mos la/ lha dgod pa ni gzhi'i sangs rgyas gtso bo rin chen 'byung ldan las dang / de dang
25a4(rgyud 'grel): cha mthun pa'i sems dpa' bzhi dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis bskor ba bkod la/ khyamasu ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod/ sgom pa'i sgo bzhir bris te/ legs par zin pa dang mchod pa yang rgyas par phul
25a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ bstod nas bum pa gzhug cing lha rnams dbang bskur bas bdag nyid bsgrubs la/ gzhan gyi don du slob ma me tog thogs pas sdom pa 'dzin par nus pa la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ de nas dbang bskur nas slar yang dkyil 'khor la
25a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod de/ bzod par gsol zhing bshags pa bya ba dang / lha rnams bsdu zhing spyod lam ci bder bya'o// ser sna rnam dag rin chen 'byung // dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las// dge ba bsags par gang gyur pas// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid
25b1(rgyud 'grel): thob shog/ slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi
25b2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// dug gsum zhan pa'i 'khor ba'i gcod snying la// 'tsho byed sman
25b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po las kyi mchog/ ye shes sku can 'jam dpal de btung nas// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad// de la spyir phrag dog gi gnyen por sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/
25b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis srid pa'i grong khyer las brgal ba'i dgon pa'i gnas su rdzas dang mkho ba'i yo byad las/ stan bde ba la byams pa'i go bgos la 'dug ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams nas snying
25b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i yan lag bsgoms te/ bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa bsal nas bdud kyi dpung rnams pham par byas nas/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro don du spyan drangs la/ phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / lus 'dul ba dang / bstod pa byas la
25b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgyub thams cad snang ba med par mos pa las/ rnamakha'i khams yaM ge spro zhing 'dus pa las byung ba'i khang pa brdzogs pa'i nang du/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi ba ba grub pa'i ye shes sems dpa
26a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdzogs par byung ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang / de dang cha mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / mtshan gyi byin brlabs las byung ba'i phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i las rgyal
26a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog bsgom par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ rtsig pa 'am bris te/ lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'o// de la sems dpa' rigs dang mthun pa bzhis bskor ba/ sgeg mo la sogs pa
26a3(rgyud 'grel): da dang / bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / sgo ba rnams mdzes par bris la/ de rnams la yang dag par mchod de/ lha'i snang ba thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma skal ba dang ldan pa bcug ste dbang
26a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur te/ yon gyi mchog blangs nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gnang ba sbyin te/ dkyil 'khor lha la yang dag par mchod nas gshegasu gsol te/ dkyil 'khor bsdu'o// phrag dog don yod grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga bris pa las//
26a5(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa'i dge des 'gro ba kun// don yod grub pa nyid 'grub shog/ don yod grub pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
26a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i khrus kyi cho ga ni dang por bum pa bruM las ye
26b1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la/ de'i nang du baM las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsams te/ de'i steng du hrI/ las pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma dang bcas par bsams la de'i steng du myi bsam/ de 'od du gyur pa las ut+pal dkar po cig
26b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ de zhu ba las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sku mdog ston kA'i zla ba wAr dkar ba/ g.yas na ut+pal sngon po ral gris mtshan pa/ g.yon na ut+pal sngon po pa ti sa mtshan pa bsgom/ de'i snying gar zla ba las mu bsam/ de'i 'od
26b3(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi de dang 'dra ba spyan drangs la bstim/ sngags 'di brjod pas ye shes kyi chur zhu bar bsam/ oM sarba d+harmA a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsuk+kha a A aM a/ zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi chus khrus byas pas rang gi sgo gsum dag
26b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// 'dud kyi bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i khrus kyi cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzog so// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal
26b5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i chu sbyin bya bar 'dod pas/ khrus chu'i lhag ma de la rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dag par byas te/ mos pa bsgyur la ye shes sems dpa'i sku'i phreng sngags brjod la/ de'i rjes la
26b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du chu sbyin no// oM dza la mi taM sarba pre te b+h+yaHswA hA zhes yi dgas rnams la sbyin pas 'thungs te/ nyon mongs pa byang bar gyur cig ces brjod do// dge ba se mas can thams cad dang thun mong du bya'o// mtshan yang dag par
27a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i chu sbyin slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogasaso// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas ci za ba'i tshe
27a2(rgyud 'grel): zas kyi rnal 'byor 'di ltar bya'o// gang yang zas kyi dngos po stong par bsams te/ oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM Ad+ya nud pan na twA ta swA hA/ zhes pas dag par bsams la/ A yongasu gyur pa las bdud rtsi dkar po dri ma med pa
27a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / oM yongasu gyur pa las mang zhing spel ba dang / hUM gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs te/ lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs te/ snying gar lha tshogs gsal btab la dang por lha dkon mchog mchod/ de nas lha
27a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ci rigs par mchod la/ rang gi lus kyi lha tshogs tshim par byas la/ lhag ma 'byung po kun la sbyin no// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i zas kyi rnal 'byor slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
27a5(rgyud 'grel): so/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'byung po'i gtor ma'i dngos po dpag posam gyi shing chen por mos pa byas lnga/ de las 'thung po thams cad
27a6(rgyud 'grel): la ci dang tsi 'dod pa'i mkho ba'i yo byad dang / zhal zas de dang de 'byung bar bsams te/ dga' sngon chen po byed par byas te/ 'jam dpal sku'i phreng sngags brjod do// sngags 'dis sbyin no// i daM to tat+taM ma shaM san+d+hi ta pre
27b1(rgyud 'grel): ta sarba ga tI ma ga ta de sha ma ni ne na he tu ma nI sha sa d+hu mAM b+ha d+ha swA hA zhes lan gsum brjod pas/ 'byung po thams cad ngoms shing tshim par gyur pas sdug bsngal las dbugs 'byin dga' ston chen por gyur pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog ste/
27b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i tshe ba las shin tu grol bar gyur zhing sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mngon du 'gyuraro// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'byung po'i gtor ma slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs// / 'phags pa
27b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga'i rim pa/ sa 'jam po la rin po che sna lnga brdar te tsan dan gyi chus spras pa la srog chags bsal te 'thas par bcags la khru chen po gang gi tshad du brkos la
27b4(rgyud 'grel): dngul lam rdo hUMs la sogs pas byugs te/ dbyibs me long gi gsal ngos ltar byas la/ swa rat+na maN+Dal ye shes me tog gi tshom bu yang tshul dang mthun par mdzes par bkram ste/ dri dang ldan par byas nas gang mkho ba'i yo byad dang / me
27b5(rgyud 'grel): tog gi tshom bu dang / pad+ma'i gdan la sogs par byin gyis brlabs te/ gdan dang bcas par dbul bar bya'o// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so//
27b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// sgrub pa po dad pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas bskor bar byed par 'dod pas/ bdag nyid 'jam dpal gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sa phyogs de skyang nul byas te dri
28a1(rgyud 'grel): zhim pos chag chag btab la/ sku gzugs la sogs pa mig gi rten mngon par bzhag ste/ sa phyogs de nyid du yi ge hri las nges par byung ba'i pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma sna tshogs pa yal ga dang bcas pa bsams la/ dbus su
28a2(rgyud 'grel): seng+ge'i khri la zla ba'i steng du sprul pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad shAkya thub pa chos 'chang pa'i phyag rgya can gser gyi kha dog can mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan par bltas la/ de'i g.yas na 'jam dpal kha dog kha ba la gur kum gtor ba lta bu mchog
28a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa/ g.yon na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs la nyi ma shar ba lta bu/ ngag gi dbang phyug 'gying ba'i tshul du gnas te sems can la bdud rtsi sbyin par mdzad pa dang / mdun du phyag na rdo rje bai DUr+ya'i mdog can
28a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstod de/ g.yon pa zhi ba'i phyag rgya can/ de'i phyi rol na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis bskor ba/ de'i phyi rol na byang chub sems dpa' stong du bzhis ma tshang bas bskor ba/ de la phyi rim na 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyis
28a5(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba bltas te/ de la dad pa bskyed cing phyag 'tshal nas bskor ba bya ba ni mtshan gdon pa'am ye shes sems dpa'i sku'i phreng sngags brjod par bya'o// de lta bu'i bskor ba ji srid nus pa de srid du byas te/ bde bar gshegs pa de rnams kyi
28a6(rgyud 'grel): drung du 'dug la/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran po dang / chos rjesu dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran par byas la/ snying ga nas sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod de/ 'dud nyi shus yang dag par bstod la/ sdig pa gshegs pa dang rje su yi rang ba la
28b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed// de nas de rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od byung nas bdag la gal su bskor te/ bdag gi snying gar thim par bsams pa'i byin rlabs kyis las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag nas lus kyang chu zla lta bur bsam
28b2(rgyud 'grel): mo// de ltar dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen por bsngos la de rnams kyang mi snang bar bsgom mo// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bskor ba bya ba'i thabs slob dpon 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzogs
28b3(rgyud 'grel): so// // 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs bsags pa'i thabs la/ 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la// lus ngag yid gsum
28b4(rgyud 'grel): gus ldan pas// kun nas btud de phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas zhing du rab bsngags dang // 'jig rten dag na mchog gyur pa// rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs// kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi// bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig/ kun
28b5(rgyud 'grel): nas bsags par gang gyur pa// rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis// rgyal ba kun gyis spyan sngar bshags// mgon po rnams kyi bsod nams dang // dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la// de bzhin mthun par lhag sems kyis// dad pas rjesu
28b6(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ngo // bde gshegs byang chub sems bskyed nas// 'gro ba thugs rjes gdul slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la// tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs// yongasu mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// 'gro ba yun du bde ba'i phyir// ji srid 'kho
29a1(rgyud 'grel): ba de srid du// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugasu gsol// ji srid 'khor bar gnas par du// bdag gi dge ba'ang de bzhin du// kun nas zad par mi 'gyur bar// sems can yongasu smin par shog/ dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni//
29a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub snying por mchis kyi b.ro// mgon po'i 'bangasu 'bul lags kyis// thugs rjes yongs su gzung bar mdzod// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas// bde gshegs khyed kyi bka' bzhin du// sems can kun don sgrub lags kyis// byin gyis
29a3(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa mdzad du gsol// rgyal ba mnyes phyir bzlas pa rin po che// dad pas spyan sngar rtag tu mtshong bgyid pas// lus ngag dub dang bsam pa g.yengs pa yis// cung zad bde bar gnas 'tshal bzod par ba zhes// dad pas bskyed pa
29a4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams phra mo yis// 'ga' yang chud zos mi 'gyur don gyi phyir// gsang sngags rin chen rnam grangs ci tsam zhig/ mgon po bdag nyid la ni gdams par bgyi// nad dang sdug bsngal la sogs dgra bgegs dang // 'khor lo'i rgya
29a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshor gnas pa sna tshogs dag/ 'di dang pha rol gnyi gar rtag tu 'byung // gsang sngags rin chen 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs bsags pa'i thabs/ slob
