234a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// yi ge a la sems gtad la// ngag gi mtshan ni gsal brjod pa'o// de yang rang bzhin med shes bya// shes nas rtog pa rnams dang bral// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // 'jig
234a2(rgyud 'grel): rten 'das pa lha rnams kun// mA lus thams cad dgyes nas su// yon tan thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dus gsum dag tu brjod pa dang // yang ni dus drug ngag tu brjod// yang na dus kyi nges med pas// nus
234a3(rgyud 'grel): tshad dag tu brjod pa'o// mtshan ni brjod pas skyo ba na/ shes rab 'khor lo sngags drug las// sngags dang mthun pa'i 'od byung nas// lus snang thams cad gsal bar byas// mi shes ri bo thams cad bcom//
234a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol ngag tu 'phros pa las// na mkha'i khams kun khyad par gnas// sangs rgyas zhing kham gsal gyur nas// chos sku ye shes thob pa'i don// byas nas slar ni bzlas pa las// snying gar zla stengs a las
234a5(rgyud 'grel): thim// brtan pas yang dang yang du bsgom// de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis// ye shes bsgoms na sbrul sku dang // zla ba'i sgo nas longs sku dang // a yi sgo nas chos sku dang // ring po mi thogs par
234a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba// brtan pas yang dang yang du bsgom// de lhor spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sems can la// nye bar bzung ni mngon snang ba'o// de nas stong nyid la gnas bya// a nyid thig le
234b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub ste// byang sems thams cad de la 'dus// bde ba thams cad der gnas na// 'ja' tshon lta bu'i thig le ste// shes pa bying rgod med pa yis// gsal ba dang pas 'bad par bya// sems nyid de rang bzhin zhe na// chos
234b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang la gnas zhes bya// thig le ji phra shes pa phra// rang bzhin med pas gnas pa'o// sems nyid btang snyoms gsal ba la// gsal ba mi rtog thob pa'o// de la brten nas gsal ba de// snang la rang bzhin med pa
234b3(rgyud 'grel): thob// 'bras bu cho su thob pa'o// de nas skyo ba byung ba na// oM AHhUM muMHgshegasu gsol// thams cad bsdus nas lha nyid gnas// ngag tu bzlas pa nus tshad bzlas// zhi la gnas shing snying rje bskyed// sems can don la
234b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' sems bskyed// gtor ma rtag tu sbyin par bya// stan ni gcig pu 'dug nas su// lam lnga nyam su myong bar bya// tshogs lam bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// sbyor lam bzlas pa byed pa dang // mthong lom mtshan nyid brjod pa ste//
234b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom lam 'phro 'du dag la gnas// mthar phyin stong nyid sems pa'o// dge bas brtsams pa'i sgrub thabs la// 'gal 'khrul mchis na mkhas bzod mdzod// brtsams po'i dge rtsa yod srid na// sems can mos dang
234b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng bar shog/ dge bsnyen ma snyan grags dgo mas mdzad pa// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogaso//
235a1(rgyud 'grel): phags dpal rang ma ma tha mag btsun ga/
235b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA many+dzu shrI rAt+na no bi ka/ bod skud du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i cho ga/ rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha lo// bden pa dang ldan 'dzin bral ba// 'jam pa yang ngag kun
235b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa// de bzhin nyid kyi ngang gnas pa// smra ba'i seng+ge phyag 'tshal lo// de la gus pas 'dud pa yis// dus ni rtag tu bsgom pa dang // mos po byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yi don du bshad par bya// stong pa la dga'
235b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob pa// dam tshig ldan zhing bsgom pa dga'// rnal 'byor srog stong dad pa che// sems can don byed byas la drin// rtag tu mtshan brjod bzlas la brtson// de ltar yon tan bcu ldan pas// yid dgo' ba yi gnas
235b4(rgyud 'grel): dag tu// bde ba'i stan la gnas par bya// tha mal yi dam dran pa la// snying gar yi ge muM ser dgod // kha dog lnga yi 'od 'phros nas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras bla ma ni// spyan drangs mdun du bsams pa la// phyag 'tshal
235b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sdig pa sbyang // yi rang skyabasau 'gro sems bskyed la// dge bsngo 'dud la sogs pas bstod// de nas stong nyid bsam pa ni// oM A kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+har+m+ma NAM AM d+ya nut+pan na twA ta swA hA/ sngags don dngos po med
235b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la// yuni rings dang la blo gnas pas// de nyid la ni gnas par bya'o// de nas na mkha' stong pa la// dngos po thams cad paM du gnas// de stang yi ge saM dkar las// byang chub sems dpa' seng+ges gsal//
236a1(rgyud 'grel): de steng a las zla bar gsal// gdan steng yi ge mu ser las// ut+pal sngon po mdzes par bsgom// de las 'phro 'du bya ba ste// smra ba'i sang+ge bsgom par bya// ser po gser btso 'dra ba la// g.yas
236a2(rgyud 'grel): na ut+pal po tis mtshan// g.yon pa gzhan la sbyin pa sdong // dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dzum dang ldan// thugs rje che bas nyon mongs spong // rin chen rnams kyis lus la brgya no// dbu la thor tshugs rnams kyis mdzes//
236a3(rgyud 'grel): dbu sgra gtsug phung 'khyil pa dang // stong g.yogs ser po rnams kyis mdzes// smad g.yogs dar dpyangs sbyangs pa'o// rmugs pa'i rnam pa ma yin pas// gsal ba rtag tu bsgom pa'o// de nas spyan drangs mchod pa'o//
236a4(rgyud 'grel): oM bA gI shwa ra dzar+dz+dzaHhU~M baM hoHoM A hUM gis mchod yon dbul// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe A~MHhUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he A hUM/ oM badz+ra dI pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra nai bi d+ye AHhUM/ ba li na~M ta kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/
236a5(rgyud 'grel): A hUM/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stong nyid las byu nga khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyed la 'dud// sang+yas 'dod la phyag
236a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tsha la 'dud// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud//
236b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// na mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud//
236b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dung // thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud // ces bya bas bstod do// gnyis med bdag la bsdu bya'o// snying gar pad+ma'i zla ba las// steng ni ye shes
236b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ste// mtshonA gang dang 'dra gsal bar bsgom// yi ge a mchog zla ba la// thugs kar bsam par bya ba'o// ye shes sngags phreng bskor bar bya// oM sarba d+har+m+ma a b+ha baM/ swa b+hA bA/ bi shud+d+ha/ badz+ra tsak+Sha/ a
236b4(rgyud 'grel): A aM aHpra kr-i ti/ pra ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+har+m+ma ya du ta sarbe ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dza shrI/ pa ri shrud+d+hi tA/ mu pA dwau ye ti a A sarbe ta thA ga ta/ ha ra ha rau/ au hUM hrIHb+haM ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mU ra ti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA ba
236b5(rgyud 'grel): tsa/ sarba d+har+m+ma/ gA ga nA a maM la su pa ri shu d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hi t+yA dzA na ger+b+ha AH/ gsal bar phreM nga ba sngags la gtang // brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya// de nas mtshan rnams brjod pa la// ye shes sems
236b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ngag la ni// dmigs pa brtan pa gtang nas su// yon tan dag tu brjod pa'o// de yang gal te ma brtan na// g.yeng bar gyur na nus pa chung // de la brtan par gyur pa na// ye shes gnyis med skye yang
237a1(rgyud 'grel): srid// yon tan dag tu brjod pa yang // theg pa mtha' chos ston mdzad pas// thams cad ngo bo yin shes las// thams cad de dang ldan par ston// de ltar byas shing bstod gyur na// chos sku mtha' dag
237a2(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur// bsam pa ci 'dod de las 'byung // lha srin sde brgyad dga' 'gyur nas// 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba'o// de nas 'bad pas mtshan brjod gdon// skyo bar mi 'gyur gus par bya// skyo ba dag ni byung ba na//
237a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gnyisu med par bya// a las stong pa tsam pa las// gsal bar rtog med bsgom par bya// de nas a ni zhu ba las// thig le dkar po je chung las// ya shes stong pa nyid gsal gau/ bying rgod med par gsal
237a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ yang dang yang du gtang la bsgom// snang bya rang bzhin med mthong 'gyur// yung na shes rab 'khor lo ste// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can// yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das//
237a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pa las// bzhi ni gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo yi// lte ba ye shes 'khor lo ste// bcu gnyis rtsibs can 'khor lo la// sgrogs kyis rnam par bkod pa ni// a A a A rim par bgod // de nas yang dang yang
237a6(rgyud 'grel): dgod // dbus su a mchog bsam par bya// de nas snying gir shes rab 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu gnyis dang ldan pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis g.yas nas bskor nas bkod par bya// lte ba la ni a mchog
237b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// mgrin par shes rab 'khor lo ni// bcu gnyis rtsibs mtshan gnas pa la// lte ba a bsgom rtsibs rnams la// a ra pa tsa na/ bA gI shwa ra/ pradz+nyA na mar rim pas dgod par bya'o// de nas spyi bo'i 'khor lo
237b2(rgyud 'grel): labacu gnyis rtsibs la dgod par bya ba ni// sku'i phreng sngags te las sngagaso// dbus su a dkar chen po gnas// 'og nas haM dkar bzlog nas bsam// dbus na yi ge yod pa ste// bsam gton bzhi'i rtse mo
237b3(rgyud 'grel): de la bya// 'khor lo nang stong 'od ltar 'dug/ stong pa'i nang yi ge rdul thig geng ltar bsam// dbus kyi thig le'i rang bzhin yin// dga' ba du ma yod pas blta// 'khor lo bani la shes rab ste// thig le a ba d+hU tI
237b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs// nor bu'i rtse nas hU~M la thug/ dkar po 'od du 'dug pa'o// de nas byang chub rgyu ba'o// nor gnas tsaN+Da li gnas pas// de la gtang de bsam pa'o// 'khor lo de ltar gnas pa ni// yan lag bya baM de yin no// med pa
237b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsis las 'das pa ste// chang med bsam gtan byed pa'o// de yang tsAN+Da li la gtod paso// me 'bar drong las brten nas byung // a ba d+hA tI lam zhugs nas// lte bar me 'bar thams cad bsregs// de ltar 'khor
237b6(rgyud 'grel): lo bzhi ga yi// spyi bo'i bde ba ngang gis bu// 'o ma ltar dkar thams cad gang // nor bu phebs nas lte gnas 'dren// rlung dang bstun nas yang yang 'dren// de stengs lus gso bde ba 'byung // snang ba dga' ba sgyu
238a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bcu drug ldog po lta bu 'byung // tha mal zag med ye shes skye// skyo 'am bsam gtan gtong 'dod na// spyi bor bsdu bar 'dod pa yi// dga' bral song yang nyes mi 'gyur// tha mal tha bra/
238a2(rgyud 'grel): las ma byung bas// nyes pa chen po 'ong mi 'gyur// de yang rlung gi gtan thob pa// bya bar rung gi gzhan nas min// tha mal zag me de thob pa la// med pa'i tshig 'das de yin no// tha mal gshegasu gsol ba dang //
238a3(rgyud 'grel): lha yi nga rgyal gnas par bya// spyod pa dge ba gang mos byas// dang yong khro med sbyin par bya// lus ngag yid kyis bya ba kun// bde ba che la ngang gnas bya// ma brjed pa yi bsam gtan bsten// de ltar byas na bla
238a4(rgyud 'grel): mang 'gyur// gzhon nu'i sku 'tshong thob par 'gyur// tshe 'di dag la bde bar 'gyur// bdag gis bsags pa'i tshi ga yis// 'gal ba ma mchis lha la bshags// dge ba'i rtsa ba yid 'ong kun// thams cad 'a
238a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal thob par shog// 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i sgrub thabs/ dge bsnyen ma grags sbyin mas mdzad pa/ smr-i ti dz+nyA na kArtis bsgyur ba rdzogaso// // 'jam dpal chos dbyings gsung dbang gi
238a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus par gyur pa// ma ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don thams cad sgru ba pa nam tho 'dri ma med pa shin tu yongasu dag pa chos kyi dbying
238b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i don gyi dgongs pa sbas pa phyin ci mchog pa'i man ngag las brgyud pa brjod par bya ste// de nas yang dag bshang bgyi ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//
238b2(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dong // rta babs bzhi ni rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin
238b3(rgyud 'grel): chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab bo// de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi// thig gis yongasu bskor bar bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis par// rdo rje kA ba'i nang logs
238b4(rgyud 'grel): suHzla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong ba// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sarar+ya bcas+ho// dag pa thams cad rab tu gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni//
238b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ma nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil 'khor 'dra// sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar// chags bral la sogs pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// skra mchog chen po mthon ka'i rtse// sangs
238b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rin chen cod pan ldan// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag bsnams// byis pa'i rgyan gyis yang dge spud// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
239a1(rgyud 'grel): dpe byad brgyad cus yang dag brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ches// phyag gnyis dgra ni rnam par brgyan// ral gri mnga' rang rdo rje yis// g.yas pa'i phyag mchog rnam par mdzes/ shes rab
239a2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin dang gzhu// rdo rje dril mchog g.yon pa na// dri med dpe bral bsam mi khyab// shes rab ye shes dri ma med// mgon po sangs rgyas kun 'i dngos// dkyil 'khor mdun gyi gtso gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rdo rje'i
239a3(rgyud 'grel): skyil krud bcas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni nges parA dgod// pad+ma'i 'dab ma thams tsau drA la// seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng bzhugs shing // thams cad rin chan bdun bskor bar// 'khor lo can ni brgyad po bri// gtsug tor chen
239a4(rgyud 'grel): po yi ge bdag/ shar gyi 'dabo mar yang dag bri// gtsug tir gdugs ni dkar po dag/ nub kyi 'dab mar dgod par bya// gzi brjid phung po lho phyogasu// gtsug toru rnam rgyal byang phyogasu// rnam par 'thor pa dbang
239a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyogs// me yi phyogasu gyen 'byung dgod// gyen 'byung chen po bden bral phyogs// rgyal ba rlung gi phyogasu bri/ sngags rnams kun la'ang sgrub pa pos// 'khor lo can no de dag bri/ rdo rje shugs kyi song nasu//
239a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzhi po dag tu ni// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang // sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba// dbang ldan phyogs nas
239b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams nas ni// go ra bzhin byi bar bya// de nyid kyi ni mtshams kyi char// spyan dang de bzhin mA s+yA kI// gos dkar de bzhin sgrol ma ni// rab tu 'bad de b+hi bar bya// sgro rnamasu yang sgo srungs ni// rang gi mtshan mas
239b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgyan pa// rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pa// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// rdo rje shu gas kyis byung nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gnyis pa rU// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo srungs rnams dang yang dag ldan// dag pa'i gzungs
239b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor du// der ni cho ga bzhin bri bya// shar phyogasu ni sa rnams bri// de bzhin lho ni ra bA 'bar ba'i// pha rol phyin pa thams cad bri// nub tu dbang rnams bcu po ste// byang du gzungs ni thams cad bri// de bzhin
239b4(rgyud 'grel): mtsham su sgeg myo sogs// dngos grub bde bau kun+da stsogs pa// grA sIng sngags don+da dang ldan+da pAr b+hi// rdo rje shugs kyi byu gan su// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni// bskul pra bzang po thams cad dang // de bzhin sgo srung
239b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang bri// rdo rje me tog la sog skyes pa'ang // go rims ji bzhin bri bir bya// de'i yang phyi rol bri bar bya// phyi rol rdo rje rig sa kyi gnas// zlum zhing kun tu bzang ba dang // sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par yang // der ni tshangs
239b6(rgyud 'grel): baM la sogs pa// chung ma la sogs tshogs kyis brgyan// rgyan dang rang gi mtshon mar ldan// kun tu rims bzhin legs par bri// phyi sgo'i shi ra gyi cha la ni// gshin rje gshing po'i phyag rgya che// thams cad bsrungs la rab
240a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa// rnam pa kun tu legs par g.yon brkyang pas ni legs bzhugs shing // phyag g.yas dbyug pa 'phya @na thugs kar sdig mdzub bsgreng // rab tu drag par bya ba/
240a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hu rA gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che'o// phyag rgya chen po / wa chen po rta mgrin g+hI/ phyag rgya chen po nab phigs// rdo rje 'jigs byengakargya chen po byed phyogs// b+hi ya~M dkyil 'khar phyi rol pa// 'phru
240a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir ni thams cad dgod// de'i phyi rol khor yug dang // dUr yug chen po de bzhin bri// blo ldan yang dag kun rdzogs par// sngags shes pas ni legs par bri// / da ni sku mdog la sogs pa'i rjes
240a4(rgyud 'grel): bya bo shad par bya ste// bcom ldan 'ongs 'dzum pa'i sa ni b+ha ba nya ba'i myadangs ldan gyi snre la/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i cod pan g+hi srang du/ sangs rgyas lbu
240a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i r+b+he br-in+da tsan du byas te/ lhag ma ni gsal sal par zad do// 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad ni kun kyang gser gyi mdog can/ dzi rje'i skyil mo krung gis ba 'grus pa// rin po che'i de rgyan can/ bgo
240a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na 'khor lo bstod do bsnams pa// phyag g.yon rdzas gdan la gnyis pas rten par mdzad pa'o// zhe sdang chen po bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ni/ ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog sa/ zhal bas pa/ phyag brgyad pa
240b1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i skyil mo krung gis glang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa/ zhal g.yas pa gdangs shing drag po/ zhal g.yon pa tshems kyi sgros gnon pa/ zhal rgyab ma mchog tu
240b2(rgyud 'grel): gangadug pa thams cad skrag par mdzad pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / mnga' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang / dril bu dang / gzhu dang zhags pa
240b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i dbu rgya ni mnga' ba// zhal ser po dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ldan pa phyag brgyad pa rdzo
240b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i skyil mo krung gis rta'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mnga' dang / ljags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / gzhu dang
240b5(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa bsnams pa'o// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa ni sku mdog dmar po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ zhal
240b6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dmar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / ser po mnga'i ba/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / mda' dang ral gri dang / lcags kyu bsnams po/ phyag g.yon rnams na pad+ma dang / gzu dang /
241a1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dang / dril bu bsnams pa'o// khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa ni sku mdog nag po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis na mkha' lding
241a2(rgyud 'grel): gi khri la bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po mche ba gtsigs pa/ kha dog nag po g.yas pa zhi ba/ kha dog dkar po rgya bri sgeg pa/ kha dog dmar po/ g.yon pa zhi ba'i tshul can mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yos pa rnams na ral gri dang rdzi
241a3(rgyud 'grel): rje dang / mnga' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na dril bu dang / gzhu dang / sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ rang gi
241a4(rgyud 'grel): gdan gyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// go rim ji bzhin bri bar bya// zhes bya ba lnga/
241a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbang ldan gyi phyogasu rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas kyis rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bstod pa'i
241a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis bsnams pa/ g.yon bsnyems pas dril bu bsnams pa// pad+ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng ni rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan dang / skyil mo krung dang / dbu rgyan gyi
241b1(rgyud 'grel): nges pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa dang / thun mongs yin la khyad par rnams ni bri bar bya ste/ rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren cing bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar po dang / mnga'
241b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o// rdo rje legs pa margad kyi mdog tson phyag gnyis kyis le gos so zhes bya ba stsol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang
241b3(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang bskur ba'i gnasu phyag gnyis kyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po// phyag gnyis kyis rang gi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o// rdo rje rgyal
241b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan sku me dog na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs// phyag ginyi sI yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// rdo rje bzhad pa ni sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa bya ltar dkurA ba/ so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis pa
241b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon pa bsnyems pas pid+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas byas pad+ma'i 'deb ma kha 'byed pa'o//
241b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnon po ni 'dir sku mdog gur kum lte bu phyag g.yas kyi ral gri 'phyar be/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o// rdo rje rgyu hUM mdog gsar gyi mdog can
242a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje smra ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas na lce'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yon pa dung bsnams pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa'i dkyil
242a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du// rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gro phyag gnyis na rdo rje NAM gAs ma pa bsnams nas spyi bor 'jogs cing de bzhin gsheg ste pa rna masA la mchod pa'i don du gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje srung ba sku mdog
242a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go bstims pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po bya ga gnyis kyis mche ba gnyis rlung gi zhal du 'dzin cing gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas brtsegs pa'o// rdo rje
242a4(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bsdams nas bzhugs pa'o// mtshams rnamasu spyan ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra'o// mA ma kI ni mi bskyod pa dang 'dra'o// gos dkar mo ni 'od dpag tu
242a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang 'dra'o// sgrol mo ni don yod par grub pa dang 'dra'o// sems ma bcu drug ni kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang / dga' yi chags ma dang lags ldan ma ste/ rdo rje rigs
242a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o// rin po che'i gtso bo dang / rata na'i sgrol ma dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan dang / bkod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzhi ni rata na'i rigs kyi'o// rdo rjes rmo dang kun tu 'khor lo ma rlan 'dzin ma dang / stong du
242b1(rgyud 'grel): zlos ma ba ni pad+mo rigs kyi'o// dngos grub kyi rtse mo dang / thams cad srung ma dang / madrangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya rnams dang bzhi ni las kyi rigs kyi'o// sku mdog phyug mtshan sems dpa' bcu
242b2(rgyud 'grel): drug dang mthun no// 'di yi lugs kyis sman ma la rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpas bskor/ mA ma kI la rin po che'i rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bskor/ gzhan gnyis po ye nga rigs mthun pas bskor ba'o// 'dir
242b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thig gi nang lo gsu ri mo zur bzhi pa byas pa'i brgyad cha ni sgo ste rta babs med pa'o// lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i shar gyi sgrar rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa/ g.yas
242b4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang pas bzhugs pa'o// lho'i sgor rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje zhugs pa bsnams po/ g.yon brkyang pas bzhugs pa'o// nub kyi sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje
242b5(rgyud 'grel): lu gu rgyud bsnams pa sa ga'i 'dug stengs kyis bzhugs pa'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'bebs ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje dang dril buM bsnams pa/ zlumau po'i 'dug stangs
242b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhug sa ba ri bri bar bya ste/ nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur te/ gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gnyis pa de yeng shar phyogasu sa bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste/ kun kyang sna tshogs pad+ma
243a1(rgyud 'grel): la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyun can/ byug g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa'o// de las mos pas sbyong ba'i sa ni sku mdog pad+ma l+yA
243a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba phyag g.yon na pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i sa ni rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/ ga/ g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa'o// dri ma med pa'i sa ni nor bu tshon shel gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyi
243a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dag par so sor rtog pa'i pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// 'od byed pa'i sa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o// 'od 'phro ba'i su ni margad lta
243a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon+da na ut+pal bsnams pa'o// shin tu sbyang+ga dka' ba'i sa ni sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon pa pang par bkan nas bzhag pas nor bu marka tA bsnams pa'o// mngon du gyur pa'i sa ni gser bco ma lta bu'i
243a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyi pad+ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs pa ma bsnams pa'o// ring du song ba'i sa ni na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yon gyi sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje bsdams pa'o//
243a6(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo ba'i sau ni ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yon pas bsnyems pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa mdog dmar po ste/ pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin pa'o// legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa ni sku
243b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar skya phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o// chos kyi sprin gyi sa ni gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon gyi chos kyi sprin gyis yongasu bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams
243b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ni nyi ma gung gi mdog can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bsnams pa'o// lho phyogasu pha rol tu phyin pa
243b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa/ gzhon zhing dar la bab pa zhal gyi pad+ma sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rgyas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs
243b4(rgyud 'grel): pas spras pa'i gser gyi gdu bus lag ngar bkang ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang rtse bran mnga' ba/ phyag g.yas pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams pa/
243b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa/ rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de la rin po che'i pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pad+ma dmar po ltar sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o//
243b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon pas 'bru dang rin po che sna tshogs po'i snye ma bsnams pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yon pas a shwa ka'i me tog gi mgo lcogs
244a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dub ma dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gser mi mngag can phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa Na g+ni mdog cam byugu g.yan pas
244a2(rgyud 'grel): ut+pa la bsnams pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ phyag g.yon pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang
244a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o// phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o// thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pri yang ku ltar sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po'i steng du rdo rje bsdams pa'o// smon lam gyi pha
244a4(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa ut+pal sngon po'i lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa hi ma'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams
244a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o rdo ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ge bsnams pa'o// rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog
244a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa phyag g.yon pas sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o// nub phyogasu dbang bcu pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa mnga' ba gzhon zhing dar la
244b1(rgyud 'grel): bab pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ zhal gyi pad+ma cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan u t+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba// 'od mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa/ g.yon na bsnyems pas
244b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de la tshe lo dbyung ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'dab ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
244b3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa'i sku bstims pa'o// sems la dbang ba zla ba'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis me tog/ ban dz+ra kaM ltar dmar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o// yo byad la dbang ba sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
244b4(rgyud 'grel): tsheche'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// las la dbang ba marka ta wA bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon sna tshogs rdo rje bstims pa'o// skye ba la dbang ba sku mdog sna tshogs pa/ phyag g.yon kha dog sna tshogs pa dzA ti'i yal ga bsnams pa'o//
244b5(rgyud 'grel): skye ba la dbang ba sku mingag sna chags pa/ phyag g.yan khaM dag sna tshogs/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o// mos pa la dbade ba pad+ma'i rtsa bi ltar mdog
244b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba/ phyag gi yon na mi tog pri yang ku'i snye ma bsnams pa'o// smon lam la dbang ba gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa'o// ye shes la dbang ba mthon ka chen po'i midog can/ phyag
245a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na ut+pal sngon po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o// chos la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du bum pa bzang po bsnams pa'o// yid bzhin nor bu'i tshon shel gyi mdog can
245a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas na pad+ma ser po'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/
245a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// 'di gnyis kyi gdan drang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i dbang rnams dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// byang phyogasu ni gzungs bcu gnyis sna tshogs
245a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyi rtse bran can/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dkur brten
245a5(rgyud 'grel): pas rang gI mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bor bya'o// de la nor ldan gyi gzungs ni gser gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon na 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o// rin chen sgren ma'i gzungs ni/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/ phyag
245a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams po'o// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs ni sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yon na nor bu chu shel gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o// 'od zer can gyi gzungs ni sku mngag
245b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na khab dang smyud pa bsnams pa'o// rI khrod kyi lo ma can gyi gzungs ni sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na lo ma snyams pa bsnams pa'o// drag sel ma'i gzungs ni sku mdog dkar po/ phyug gAyan na
245b2(rgyud 'grel): dug gi me tog gi snyem snams pa'o// sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs ni sku mdog pri yang ku ltar ljang sir/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma dmar po'i steng du mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa bsnams pa'o// skul byed ma'i gzungs
245b3(rgyud 'grel): ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na phreng ba 'phyangs pa'i bum pa bsnams pa'o// shes rab 'phel ba'i gzungs ni ston kwa'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon na ut+pa lI sngon po'i steng du ral-i gri bsnams pa'o//
245b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi sgrib pa thams cang rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs ni nor bu mar ka ta lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon nu rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dmar skya bsnams pa'o// ye shes mi zad pa'i ze ma tog gi gzungs ni sku mdog
245b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po phyag g.yon na rin po che'i zo ma tog bsnams pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs ni gser btso mo'i mdog can phyag g.yon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sgrom bu bsnams pa'o//
245b6(rgyud 'grel): gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor/ chos so sor yang dag par rig pa sku mdog dmar skya/ rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhag pa bsnams pa sems
246a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor don so sor yang dag par rig pa sku mdog mar kar lta bu phyag na rin po che'i zhags pa bsdams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems
246a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na mtha' gnyisu pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o// gdan dang rgyan la sogs
246a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni snga ma bzhin no// byang phyogs kyi sgor spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa sku mdog marka ta ltar ldang ba/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu bsnams pa ste lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no//
246a4(rgyud 'grel): lho'i mtshams lha mo sgeg mo gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis ka rdo rdza bsnyems pa'i tshul can 'chang bi'o// lho nu ba mtshamasu phreng pa ma sku mdog dmar
246a5(rgyud 'grel): skuHphyag na rin po che'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ bzhugs tshul la sogs ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o// nub byang mtsham su glu ma sku mdog dmar po pi wang brdung ba la brtson pa ste/ lhag ma ni snga ma dang 'dra'o// byang sher mtshams su
246a6(rgyud 'grel): gor mo sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag gis mchog gi rtsed mo dang gar mdzad pa ste/ lhag ma ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o// ning gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bsrungs rnams ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do// dkyil 'khor bar ma ni
246b1(rgyud 'grel): so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srungs rnams ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin no// rim pa gsum pa'i shar phyogasu kun tu bzang po g+ha ster gyi mdog can rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan
246b2(rgyud 'grel): pabapa rin po che'i dbu rgyan can phyag g.yas kyis mchog stsol ba/ phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsdams pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o// blo gros ma
246b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gser kyi mdog can phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa'o// phyag g.yon gyis chos ston pa'i tshul gyis pad+ma bsdams pa ste/ rgyan dang bzhugs tshul la sogs pa ni kun tu bzang po dang 'dra'o// sa'i snying po gser btso
246b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas kyis sa gnon/ phyag giyon pad+ma'i steng na dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa'o// na mkha'i snying po sku mdog mar ka ta ltar ser phyag g.yas kyis rin po che'i thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa/ phyag
246b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// lho phyogasu na mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi
246b6(rgyud 'grel): shing bsnams pa'o// phyag na rin po che sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yas pa rin po tsha sbyin pa la brtson pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma'i steng du byang chub kyi zla ba bsnams pa'o// rgya mtsho'i blo gros ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag
247a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na dung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon nu ral gri bsnams pa'o// rdo rje snying po sku mdog ut+pal sngon po lta bu phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na sa bcu ston pa'i glegs bam bsnams
247a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan phyag g.yas kyis dam pa sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon ni pad+ma bsnams pa'o// mthu chen po thob pa gser gyi mdog can/
247a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas nayal gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon ne pad+ma bsnams pa'o// zla ba'i 'od pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkor ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje'i 'khor lo bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gyis pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
247a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dmar skya phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o// byang phyogasu 'od dpag tu mid pa sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar
247a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i snying du bum pa bsnams pa'o// spobs pa brtsegs pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyis se gol rdebs par brtson pa/ phyag g.yon na
247a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o// mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gur kum gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yas na 'od 'phro ba mang po 'khrug pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na mdung thung
247b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ut+pal sngon po'i bdab ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas nA ral gri bsnams pa/ phyug g.yon na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i bu dan bsnams pa bri bar bya ste/ de dag
247b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bzhugs tshul dang rgyan dang / na bza' dang / dbu rgyan rnams ni kun tu bzang po dang 'dra bar shes par bya li/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pa ni can te/ khyad por ni de yod do//
247b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de nyid kyi byang shar mtsham su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'dra ba ma lta bu'i mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa zhal dang po khro bo'i sgeg pa ste/ dmar ba g.yas pa
247b4(rgyud 'grel): drag po/ g.yon pa 'jig su rung ba/ rgyabo dpa' ba'i zhal dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa ste/ de gnyis kyis thugs kar hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba/ phyag g.yas rnams ni ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang /
247b5(rgyud 'grel): mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang bar bzhugs pa'i zhabs g.yon pas dbang phyug tshan po'i spyi bor gnon pa/ zhabs g.yas pas u ma'i nu ma rgyas pa
247b6(rgyud 'grel): na pa/ sangs rgyas kyi me tog gi phreng ba brgyus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / na bza' sna tshogs mnga' ba/ gdug pa can thams cad 'dul por bya ba'i phyi ra nges par bzhag par bya'o// shar lho mtsham su khro bo rdo rje
248a1(rgyud 'grel): me ltar rab tu 'bar ba char sprin gyi mdog can 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar bas kun tu 'khrug pa/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang / 'jig su rung ba dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i
248a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mnga' dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na dril bu dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / kha T+wAM ga btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs pa bsdams pa/
248a3(rgyud 'grel): me ser skya 'ber ba'i skra'i tshogs shin tu 'jig su rung ba/ sbrul chen po'i gdu bu dang dbu rgyan dang sku rigs dang / zhabs gdub dang / mgur chu dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 'khor lo
248a4(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa la mkhas pa les/ g.yon brkyang pas khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa gnon pa bri bar bya'o// lho nub mtsham su khro bo chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung sku mdog mthing shun ltar sngo ba/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal
248a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po drag po zhal g.yas pa rab tu rmongs pa rnams rmongs par byed pa/ zhal g.yon pa sgeg pa dang ldan pa/ zhal rgyab ma za bar byed pa/ phyag g.yas pos rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na dril bu dang / ba
248a6(rgyud 'grel): dan dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa dang / gar mdzad pa yang gnyis kyis 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa rlon pa rlung gis gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas bsnams pa/ yang gnyis na mnga' dang gzhu bsnams
248b1(rgyud 'grel): baHyang phyag g.yas na ma hA raka ta sa yongasu bkang ba'i ka pA la'i thod tshal tsa sha ka bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yon na snying gi pad+ma'i nang na ma hA mAM sas bkang ba'i ka pA la bsnams pa/ sangs rgyas lngas mtshan pa'i thod pa lnga'i
248b2(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bu can gyi cod pan mnga' ba/ 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin mnga' ba 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po mnga' ba/ g.yon
248b3(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bas tshangs pa chung ma dang bcas pa mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o// byang nub mtsham su rta mchog sku mdog ljang gu zhal bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsuM
248b4(rgyud 'grel): pab zhal g.yas drag po/ zhal g.yon tshangs pa'i gdong dang ldan pa/ spyi bo'o zhal ljang gu mchu dang spyi bo bcu nas gyen du 'degs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi swa ba dan gsum pa lta bus sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pas 'degs pa'i
248b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul du mdzad pa/ phyag g.yon na kha T+wAM gas sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa lta busaM gyen du slong ba'i tshul du mdzud pa/ byug g.yon pa'i gnyis pa na mdung thung bsnams pa/
248b6(rgyud 'grel): yang phyag g.yas kyi gnyis na ral gri dang mda'i bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na dbyug pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang pa'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa'i gcig gis dbang po dang / dbang mo
249a1(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa/ gnyis pas dga' ba mo dang / mgu ba mo mnan pa/ g.yon gyi dang pos brgya byin dang khyab 'jug mnan pa/ gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o// de
249a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed char sprin gyi mdog can/ zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa/ zhal drug po sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dong / 'jig su rung ba dang / zhi ba dang / drag po dang / rngam pa ste/
249a3(rgyud 'grel): sa rnam po sna tshogs pas yongasu khyab cing rgyas pa phyag g.yas na lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar sdigs mdzub bskrang ba dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri
249a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mnga' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na gzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa thod pa'i phreng bu'i cod pan can sbrul gyis brgyan pa stag gis pags pa mnabs pas/ mA he'i steng du rol po'i stangs stabs kyis bzhugs pa
249a5(rgyud 'grel): bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor shes rab mthar byed ge sar ser po lta bu'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po sgeg pa zhal g.yas pa gdengs shing 'jigasu rung ba/ zhal g.yon pa zhi ba zhal rgyab ma shin
249a6(rgyud 'grel): tu drag cing gtum pa phyag g.yas na gzhug par byed pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ de las gzhan pas rdo rje dang ral gri dang / mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas thugs ka'i phyogasu lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sdigs
249b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzu bsgreng ba la brtson pa de las gzhan par pri byA pra dang / mdung thung dang gzhu bsnams pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ mi bskyod pa'i chod pan tsun/ rul pa'i sbrang stabs kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par thog
249b2(rgyud 'grel): nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma mthar byed sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa zhal dang po dang / g.yas pa dang / g.yon po dang / rgyab ma ste bzhi po grangs ji lta ba bzhin du skegs pa dang / drag po dang zhi pa dang / rgod
249b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams dang ldan pa/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrogs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mnga' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams kyis sdigs mdzu ba dang / zhags
249b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ klu'i rgyal pos brgyan cing / stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la brtan par chags shing 'ching pa dang / pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du rol pa'i stang stobs kyis bzhugs par
249b5(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya'o// bying phyogs kyi sgor khro bo bags mthar byed sprin sngon po'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis rdo rje bcing bas
249b6(rgyud 'grel): dril buM bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dong mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang / gauzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa sku la sbrul gyis brgyan
250a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+rasangs rgyas kyi cod pan can g.yon brkyang pas tshogs kyi bdag po mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtsham su ri mo bris la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dgod par bya
250a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ me'i phyogs su me tog ma sku mdog ser ba phyag gnyis me tog gis bkang ba'o// bden bral gyi phyogasu 'dug pa ma sku mdog sngo ba/ phyag na spros khang bsnams pa'o// rlung gi phyogs su mar me me sku mdog dmar po//
250a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na mar mu'i sdong bu bsnams pa'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su byug pa ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dung chos bsnams pa'o// shAr phyogs kyi sgo'i mtsham su rdo rje gzugs ma sku mdog sor po phyag gi yas na me long
250a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshamasu rdo rje sgra na mkha' ltar sngo sangs/ phyag na rdo rje pi bang bsnams pa'i// nub phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshamasu rdo rje dri sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dri'i snod bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi
250a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrosgo'i mtshams rdo rje ro sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag na ro'i snod bsnams pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis byung li phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ yongasu bskor bar tshangs pa la
250a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa gau rims ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de la byang shir mtsham su dbang ldan mdog dkar po rol pa dang cod pan yod pa/ kha T+wAM ga rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar nas
250b1(rgyud 'grel): mgor gzhag pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lha mo u ma dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bri'o// de bzhin du thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mos yang dang yang
250b2(rgyud 'grel): du 'dud par byed pa la mchog tu gzhol ba/ dkyil 'khor lo mngon par phyogs par bri'o// de la 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad ni phyogs dang mtshams rnamasu bri bar bya ste/ shar du brgya byin mdog ser po rdo rje thogs pa// glang po
250b3(rgyud 'grel): chetshe dkar po la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o// shar lhor me lha mdog dmar po lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas gnyis na blugs gzar dang dbyug pa thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis phreng ba dang guN+Di thogs pa/ ras skyes la zhon pa
250b4(rgyud 'grel): chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni thams cad kyi thun mongs yin pas so sor ma smraso// lhor gshin rje mdog nag po dbyug pa dang mdung thung thogs pa/ ma he la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa
250b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bri'o// lho nub du srin po'i bdag po mdog sngon po lag na ral gri dang phub thogs pa/ mi ro la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o// nub tu chu lha mdog dkar po g.yas dang g.yon gnyis na sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs
250b6(rgyud 'grel): pa chu srin la zhon pa gdengs kha bdun pa chung ma dang bcas pa dri'o// nub byang du rlung lha na mkha'i mdog can lag pa gnyis na ba dan thogs pa ri dwags la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas par bri'o// byang du lus ngan po
251a1(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog can g.yas na lcags kyu thogs pa/ g.yon na dbyug pa thogs pa mi la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas par bri'o// 'di dag gi chung ma rnams kyi mdog la sogs pa ni de rang rang gi khyo dang
251a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// dbang ldan dang nye bar tshangs pa mdog ser po gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gnyis na pad+ma dang phreng ba thogs nas/ phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te/ 'jog pa de las gzhan pa gnyis kyis
251a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ dang pa la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o// de'i 'og tu khyab 'jug mdog nag mo lag pa bzhi pa g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang mdung thogs nA
251a4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor thal mo sbyor te 'jog pa/ de nas gzhan pa gnyis kyis sha ra'i gzhu dang / dbyug pa 'dzin pa na mkha' lding la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o// dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar po
251a5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis thod pa dang / rtse gsum thogs te thal mo sbyar ba zla ba'i rtse bran thog pa khyu mchog la zhon pa chung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongasu bskor bar bri'o// gzhon nu kA ra ti ka mdog dmar po byis pa'i
251a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can gdong drug pa/ lag pa drug pa lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas la/ yang lag pa gnyis na mdung thung dang rdo rje thogs pa/ yang gnyis na khyim bya dang / dril bu thogs pa rma bya la zhon par bri'o//
251b1(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po mdog nag po mdung rtse gsum pa dang / thod pa thogs pa'o// dga' byed dbang phyug ni mdog nag pre rdza rnga brdung pa la brtson brdzu rnga la zhon pa'o// nyi ma ni mdog dmar po lhag pa gnyis na pad+ma la gnas
251b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'o// zla ba ni mdog dkar po lag pa gnyis na pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa dang pa la zhon pa'o// mig dmar ni mdog dmar po la lag pa ga
251b3(rgyud 'grel): chu gri thog galag pa g.yon pa na mi mgo za bar byed pa glang po che la zhon pa'o// gas lhag ni mdog ser po lag na mnga' gzhu thogs pa pad+ma la 'dug pa'o// phur bu mdog dkar po lag na phrang pa dang / spyi lugs thogs pa pad+ma la gnas pa'o//
251b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ba sangs mdog dkar po phreng ba dang / gur+m+me thogs pa bum pa 'dug pa'o// spen pa mdog nag po dbyug pa thogs bai ru sbrul la zhon pa'o// sgra gcan mdog dmar nag lag na nyi zla thogs pa'o// mjug rengs mdog nag
251b5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'o// stobs bzang mdog nag po ral gri dang ga shol thogs pa glang po tsha la zhon pa'o// rgyal bar byed pa mdog ljang gu me tog gi phreng ba dang / mda' dang gzhu dang khaM phor thogs
251b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ko ki la'i shing rta la zhon pa'o// sbrang rtsir byed pa mdog dkar po lag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor thogs pa ne tso'i khri la zhon pa'o// dpyi kyi lha mdog dkar po lag na mda' dang
252a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang / kham phor dang ral gri thogs pa sprin la zhon pa'o// mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang dung skyong dang / rigs ldan te klu'i rgyal po
252a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ni gdengs ka bdun bdun dang ldan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba byas par bri'o// de la mtha' yas dang / rigs ldan gnyis ni bram ze'i rigs te mdog dmar po me lha'i bu'o// nor rgyas dang dung skyong gnyis ni rgyal rigs te/
252a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser po brgya byin gyi bu'o// 'jog po dang pad+ma chen po gnyis ni dmangs rigs te mdog nag po rlung lha'i bu'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma gnyis ni rje'u rigs tAM/ mdog dkar po chu lha'i bu'o// de dag kyang 'khor dang
252a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bri'o// thigs bzangs rigs dang stobs ldan dang / rab dga' dang rnam par snang byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni mdog nag po ral gri dang phu ba la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa lag na thogs
252a5(rgyud 'grel): pa go cha gon chas pa 'khor dang bcas par bri'o// na mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams ni gshog rgyongasna ring ba kha dog sna tshogs pa pus mo'i lha nga'i bar du khab ltar dkar ba/ de'i steng du lte ba'i khung bu la thug gi bar du
252a6(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog can de nas lkog ma'i bar du nyi ma 'char ko'i mdog can/ de nas glang pa'i steng gi mthar lug pa ri ma lus par an dzA na bcag pa lta bu'i mdog can/ nam mkha' lding du mas yongasu bskor bar bri'o// mi
252b1(rgyud 'grel): bam ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni mdog dmar skya/ lag nA bi bad+ma thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po du mas yongasu bskor bar bri'o// dri za'i rgyal po gtsug bud lnga pa ni gser gyi mdog can rgyun
252b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dri za'i rgyal po du mas yongasu bskor bar bri'o// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po don thams cad grub pa ni gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rig pa 'dzin
252b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po du mas yongasu bskor bar bri'o// gnod sbyin rnams kyang lag na bi dzi pU ra dang / ne'u le thogs pa'o// de la gang ba bzang po ni mdog sngon po/ nor bu bzang po ni mdog ser po/ nor sbyin mdog dmar po/ rnam thos
252b4(rgyud 'grel): sras ni mdog ser po pi tsi kuN+Da li mdog dmar po ki li mi li mdog ljang gu sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po/ spyod pa'i dbang po mdog ser po/ 'phrog ma gser gyi mdog can de la bu dang bcas po'o// de dag thams cad kyang
252b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o// tha skar sku mdog dkar po/ bre nye mdog ljang gu/ smin drug mdog ldong ser/ snar ma mdog dmar skya/ mgo mdog nag po/ lag mdog dkar po/ nabs so mdog dkar po/ rgyal
252b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang gu/ skag mdog dkar po/ mchu mdog dkar po/ praM mdog kri yang ku lter ljang sir/ dbo mdog ljang gu/ me bzhi mdog dkar po/ nag pa mdog ljang gu/ sa ri mdog dkar po/ sa ga mdog nag po/ lha ma
253a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams mdog ljang gu d+hAn ma ga / ga sarba stong mdog nag po/ chu smad mdog skya'o// gro bzhin mdog dkar s+ya/ byi bzhin mdog ljang gu/ mon gru mdog nug po/ mon gre mdog ser po/ khrums stong
253a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu/ khrums smad mdog ser po/ num gru mdog sor skya ste/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag thams cad kyang rgyun dang ldan zhing gos gyon pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ bud med kyi gzugasu bri'o// tshangs pa ma ni tshangs pa
253a3(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dra bar bri'o// drag po ma ni drag po lta bu'o// khyab 'jug mA ni khyab 'jug lta bu'o// gzhon nu ma ni kAn+ti ka lte bu'o// dbang po ma ni brgya byin lta bu'o// phago mo ni mdog nag po ste/ yaM dgas la zhon pa/ nya rlon pa dang /
253a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa lAg na thogs pa'o// dga' byed ma ni mdog dmar po yi dgas la zhon pa/ kA ti ra dang thod pa lig na thogs pa'o// de dang nye ba nyid du b+h+ring gi ri ti pre ste/ ma mo bdun b+h+ring zhi ri ti dang bcas par bri bar bya'o//
253a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa/ glang po che'i gdong pa can lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa na la du dang la phug thogs pa/ de las gzhan pa gnyis na mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta thogs pa/ sbrul seral
253a6(rgyud 'grel): khar thogs pa/ byi ba la zhon pa/ tshogs du mas yongasu bskor ba bri bar bya'o// lha gzhan dag kyang gzhal yas khang na gnas par bri'o// 'dir yang sgo srung rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa de dag nyid yin no// de ltar
253b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa shi na tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ma lus shing / ma tshang ba med par
253b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi
253b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o// de nas sngags pa na mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongasu dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i slob
253b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi gang gi tshe slob mas lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di ltar yid la bya ste/ ngas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bsdu bas sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya'o// 'di la yang bla na
253b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bya'o// zhes bsam mo// de nas slob ma de la che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par 'dod
253b6(rgyud 'grel): dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te bdag tshal lo zhes zer na/ des kyang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad tshogs sam/ 'on te ma yin zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te cung zad ni tshogs la cung zad ni ma tshogaso zer na/ de nas de'i lte bar
254a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrigs pa'i yi ge hUM bsam pa dang / snying gar yang las kyi sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid yi ge kaM nag por bsams la yi ge hUM gi 'bar ba'i
254a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis gyen du 'byin par byed cing sna bug g.yas pa nas nges par 'byung ba ni gcer bu'i gzugs mi sdug pa mchin pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa byung ba dang / yi ge hUM yang snying gar phyin pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi ga
254a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sna khung de nyid nas byung nos gsang sngags 'dis de za bar gyur par bsam par bya'o// oM badz+ra yak+Sha khA da ya khA da ya/ sarba pA paM A s+ya hUM phaT/ yang na hUM las byung ba'i ro stong khro bo'i gzugs la ro slad rdo rje rtse
254a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa'i phur bus gsang sngags 'di dang de nyid du phyir bus gdab par bya'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM nA baM d+ha baM d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas slob ma de yi ge saM las byung ba'i kun tu
254a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i gzugs su bsams pa/ de'i spyi bor haM las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rdza bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya ste/ de ltar byas na nang gi bdag nyid can gyi bgegs rnams 'byungangu bar mi 'gyur ro// yo byad ma
254a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa rnams kyang bde blag tu tshang bar 'gyur ro// slob ma yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o// de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ljon pas grog mkhar gyi sa dang / skra dang phub ma la sogs pa las rang rang gi phyogs
254b1(rgyud 'grel): skyong gi gzugs brnyan bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs byed pa rnams sngags 'dis bkug la bcug ste/ bcings la phur bus legs par btab ste/ hUM bzhi pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun la bzhag par
254b2(rgyud 'grel): byo'o/ 8 khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar ba byas la mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog lte bur mdud de/ mdzub mo g.yas pa lcags kyung byas la gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste sngags la/ oM badz+ri aM gu sha ma hA kro
254b3(rgyud 'grel): d+hi A kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma yaM hUM dzaHde nyid dang mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad nas zhags pa dang 'dra bar gzhag pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM badz+ra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pr-i be sha ya sarba sa mA ya hUM hUM/ de nying las
254b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar mdud pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ya sarba sa ma yA hUM baM/ de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcingasA la de rnams kyi mgo l-i yi ge hUM bkod de/
254b5(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du rdo rje phur bu skyeng la/ rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bor du phur bus gdab par bsams te/ bka' bsgo ba'i tshul gyis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ye sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de
254b6(rgyud 'grel): nas badz+ra kI li kI la ru Ta maT/ ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar yi ge hUM 'bar ba lta bus brdeg par bya ste/ cho ga 'di ni ji srid dkyil 'khor zhag gi bar du nyin re zhing nyi ma gung la bya'o// pha rol gyi bge/
255a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhom pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yid dang rjesu mthun pa'i gnas su spos chu la sogs pas nye bar byugs shing me tog sil ma gat+tor lnga bdug smos dri zhim pos bdug pa dang / ci snyed pa'i mchod
255a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa dag tu stan nang tshangs can 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ sngags 'di dag gis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o// oM sarba pA paM ka pi ka b+hi ka pa tsi kra man so d+hA ta mA rA ga d+he shA ma hA ma da mA na a
255a3(rgyud 'grel): biSh+Ti na ya d+d+hi ta me tri kA li kai/ hUM hU~M hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba pA sr-i spr-i Ta ya mi swA hA/ oM sarba pA pi pra ti ngi sha mi swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta naM/ Ad ma b+hA ba na naMr+yA ta yA maM/ sarba bau ta thA ga ta pra ti gr-ih+nan tu maM swA hA/
255a4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ti thA ga ta pra N+ye dz+nyA na sa b+hA r-I a nu mo de yA mi swA hA// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+hA d+ha mahA badz+ra sa ma ya ma hA bo d+hi tsi trA~M d+hA dA mud pa ta ya mi swA hA/ de nas oM sarba ta thA ga tA shAnA sau twa sarba sad+d+h+ya naM/ sarba sid+d+ha ya
255a5(rgyud 'grel): pan d+yan+taM sarba tra thA ga ta sh+tsa a d+hiSh+Tha nA tAM/ swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha na sarbA d+hArma/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho& haM/ zhes bya bas phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis yongasu darig pa na mkha'i dang
255a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bsgom par bya'o// de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsgom pa'i sems nyid na mkha'i ngos kyi dbus su chud pa 'od kyi dra ba chen po dang ldan pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa la
255b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi yi ge mu kha dog dmar skya/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o// de yongasu gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal zla ba lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/
255b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam dang gzhu bsnams pa nyid de/ shes
255b3(rgyud 'grel): rab ral gri mda' gzhu tho gos zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan mnga' ba/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / khro bo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig pa'i lha mo
255b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spro dang / sdud ba'i bdag nyi de can du bdag nyid rnam par bsams la/ snying ga dang sprin mtshams dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnam su rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag la rdo rje sems ma
255b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / rin tshon sems ma dang / chos kyi sems ma dang / las kyi sems ma'i ngo bo nyid de/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la/ sa ma ya sa s+t+waM haM/ zhes brjod do// de nas mdun du yi ge hri wa
255b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug la bcings la/ dbang du byas nas mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / me tog dang / spos dang /
256a1(rgyud 'grel): mar me dang / dri la sogs pas ltung dag par mchod la/ lta ba nyid du byas nas de bzhin du mchod cing dbang bskur la rang gi lus la gzhug par bya ste/ ya shas sems dpa' de bltas nas
256a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lus la rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de nas gcig tu gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byung bzang pos brgyan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
256a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bar bdog nyid shes nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings
256a4(rgyud 'grel): lhaHgan rgyal du khar bzhag ste/ thams cad bskor la sngags 'di lanA bdun bzlas par bya'o// oM badz+ro tsakra hU~M phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu r+b+ha da ltar byas pa
256a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mi ma lus pa mngon sum bzhin du yong dag par bltas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis legs par mchod de/ rje btsun gyi mtshon yang
256a6(rgyud 'grel): dag par brjed pa thun bzhi'i rim gyis ji srid du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma byung ba 'am/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir rmi lam mthong gi bar du/ oM badz+ra tik+Sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'am/
256b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags gzhan dag bzla ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can skad cig ma'i ye shes las byung ba'i rje btsun 'jam dpal du bdag nyid bsams la/ dngos po thams
256b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi ngo bo nyid sems tsam kyi sprul par khong du chud pus sems kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang drug par bltas la/ ji srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du mtshar yang dag par brjod pa bklag
256b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho gu mdor bsdus pa'o// de'i 'og tu nyin rI 'am zla ba re 'am/ lo re nyid du ji lta bar mngon par dga' bar bsgrub cing zla ba yar gyi ngo la cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de la
256b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am/ khru lnga bcu'o// blon po'im blon po chen po rnams kyis ni khru lnga bcu 'am/ nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// ded dpon nam/ tshong dpon chen po rnams kyis ni nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ de'i phyung do// sgrub pa po rnams kyis ni
256b5(rgyud 'grel): khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru drug pa'am/ ci nus par bya'o// de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad yang dag par ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phywa ma'i sbyin sreg gis dkyil
256b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi bgegs mngon par bsams la/ bdag dang slob ma la sogs pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sa sbyang bar bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam mam khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos la dri zhim po'i chus gtor ba'i sas slar
257a1(rgyud 'grel): bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste/ kun tu brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la/ sgo bzhi dang skar
257a2(rgyud 'grel): khung dra ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba la tha ma rnamasu lags par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan bzang pos gzugs pa dang / bla re dam pa bri ba dang / sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras
257a3(rgyud 'grel): ris kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa ba'i lci bas yang dag par sbyangs shing dri/ nye bar byug pa dang / mtshams bzhir spos khang gzhag pa dang / me tog dang / gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la/ lag pa
257a4(rgyud 'grel): sa lnga bzhag ste/ hUM bzhi po dang / yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yongaso bzlas par bya'o// de nas khrus byas shing dris byugs la gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang / ze'u ka bcings la me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong
257a5(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang / rna rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par brgyan te/ zlo ba nya ba nas brtsams nas/ phyi ma'i nya'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya ba 'am/ yar gyi ngo la tshes gcig nas brtsam
257a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ de bzhin du tshes brgyad dang / tshes dgu dang / tshes bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams la brtsams nas nya'i bor du 'am/ snga dro'i dus su brtsams nas bya'o// de la dang por dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus
257b1(rgyud 'grel): su 'dug la bgegs pasal la sogs pa bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngu 'dug nas/ de nyid kyis na rdo rje gzung / chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying pa
257b2(rgyud 'grel): bzla/ de ltar mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob po'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho gro'i bya ba bya ste/ rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug/ dkyil 'khor thams
257b3(rgyud 'grel): cad bsgrub pa ni// dam tshig chen po gsum zhes bya// rgya 'di gsang sngags bsgrub pa'o// dngos grub cho ga thams cad la// rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas// cho go lhagau gam ma tshang yang // 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// de yang
257b4(rgyud 'grel): dang po sa'i lha mo yi ge baM las byung ba lhag na bum pa thogs pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la/ 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug ste/ me tog la sogs pas mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de la phyag
257b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya dang sngags 'di yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la mdzub mo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis mdud pa bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'di skad brjod do// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams
257b6(rgyud 'grel): nga kyi/ spyod pa'i tshul gyis khyed par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lce mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// shAkya sang+ge skyob pa yis// dzaM ltar ro bdud rtsi sde bo tsam pa// de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ ba tsam par byas te dkyil
258a1(rgyud 'grel): gakhor to/ sa lan gA m+b+ha badzad// dAnas de nyid dmas par gyur par byasams la// de spyang du rdo rngu bcung ga bAk+Sha du bstan tu bcings la bzhug smra/ oM bad+d+ha b+hU b+hU hAg+sam+b+ha R+tha gsas bAd+hA // /
258a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bcings pa las byung ba'i hUM 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi sa gzhi gtan pa la thugs kyi bar du rdo rje gyur par rnam par bsam la 'di skad do// dr-i b+ha badz+ra tiSh+Tha/ de nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyu la mchog dang las
258a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs su 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang na gnas nas
258a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed cing / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par rim pa 'dis bsam par bya ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ phyin ci ma log par yang dag par
258a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po
258a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs po gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du bya ba rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi gang gis phyir de bzhin gshegs
258b1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi kho na nyid ma rtogs par dka' ba spyad pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam zhes gsung zhing gan du byon te/ badz+rod tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i
258b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang / se gol brdabs pas slong bar ma dzad par bsam mo// de nas langs nas mchog tu drang pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+Shi tA badz+ra praN+Da ma na badz+ra baun dI nang ka ro maM zhes brjod la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces
258b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis ma 'tshal na de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ de ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rigs kyi bu rang gi semyas la so sor
258b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog cing mnyam par zhog la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgur bzlas shing bsgrub par gyis shig/ ces gsungs shing sem gyis so sor rtogs pa'i man ngag de stsol bar bsam par bya ba ni/ oM tsit+ta pra tI bya d+haM ka
258b5(rgyud 'grel): ro mAM zhes bya ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang / bzung ba dang / 'dzin pa la so gas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyi su med pa de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtog pa de'i bdag
258b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang / sems kyi rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu rang gi snying gar bsgom par
259a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bus gda' bu bdag gis rtog so// de nas rigs kyi bu sems
259a2(rgyud 'grel): de ni rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal bas na ji ltar bur sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po la tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// zhes bka' stsal nas/ slar yang byang chub sems kyi man ngag ston par mdzad par bsam pa ni/
259a3(rgyud 'grel): oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pa da ya mi zhes bya'o// de nas shin tu 'od gsal ba'i sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam po ra yongasu gyur pa las/ rim gyis nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs
259a4(rgyud 'grel): par gyur to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong zhes bya ba ste/ shin tu rnam par dag cing na mkha' ltar dri ma med pa la smos pa thams cad dang bral ba me long lta
259a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas so// oM dz+nyA na ra shrI pri si dza hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par spros te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khar gang ba las 'od zer rnam pa sa tshogs par gang zhing byung ste/ byung ba de rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal
259a6(rgyud 'grel): yas khang du bzhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bcom ste/ rtogs par byas nas rdo rje chen po'i gzugs gcig tu gyur nas byung ste/ rtse
259b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa spyi bo nas thugs kar bzhugs te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur pa gyis de legs par bsgrub
259b2(rgyud 'grel): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla bo'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibasu soms shig/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ yang sngags
259b3(rgyud 'grel): dis spro bar bya'o// oM s+pha ra badz+ra/ e saM ha ra badz+ra/ oM oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hAM haM/ de nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang na rdo rjer
259b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis mthong // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di/ sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i da
259b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugaso// de nas de bzhin gabye ba zang
259b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje'i dbyings phra rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong ngo // sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
260a1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos la sgoms shig/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tam+b+ha thA A haM
260a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag la byin
260a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugaso// de nas skad cig de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin
260a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam po nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugaso// de bzhin gshegs pa
260a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis ngag go//
260a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gan su gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur to// de ltar sems so sor
260b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa nas brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyang rang rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar 'byung bar bsam par bya ste/ rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
260b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed de/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/
260b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu gzhag nas/ dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi phyogs bzhi nas yongasu bskor te/ lhan cig yang
260b4(rgyud 'grel): dgra pa tshor gnaso// de nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin pas byams pa dang snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas po dang mi shes pa las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
260b5(rgyud 'grel): gti mug gis bkrugs par shes nas bdag 'dir babasna la skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs par sprul pas rje su gzung bar bya'o// zhes yid la nges par byas te/ rim pa 'dis snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed
260b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// hUM yaM hUM/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// hUM baM hUM/ chu'i dkyil 'khor ro// hUM raM hUM/ me'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas nam mkha' las yi ge khaM l-is bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams li/ de'i sku'i yan lagau
261a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad las chu'i rgyun sbom po byung bas snod thams cad yongasu gang bar rnam par bsgoms la/ bcom ldan 'das pade nyid du thim par gyur par rnam par bsams nas/ me dang chu'i bar du
261a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM laM hUM zhes bya ba rnam par bkod la/ de bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba las sku rdo rje'u tinge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa las gser gyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom/ de'i steng du hU~M suM hUM zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po ri rab bsam mo// de'i
261a3(rgyud 'grel): snying du khaM las khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsams la/ de'i dbus su sa bon 'di rnams las pad+ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i grangs snyed kyi gdan rnam par bsam par bya ste/ yi ge hri las thams cad
261a4(rgyud 'grel): du pad+ma bsam/ a siM a zhes bya ba 'dis dbus su 'khor lo can gyi seng ge'i gdan shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnamasu/ hUM gaM hUM tra baM tra/ hri maM hri/ aM ga a/ 'di dag las grangs ji lta ba bzhin du glang po che dang /
261a5(rgyud 'grel): rta dang rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding gau gdan rnams bskyed par bya'o// de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig babs te/ seng+ga'o gdan la legs par 'dug ste/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi glang po
261a6(rgyud 'grel): che'i gdon la sogs pa nye bar gnas par bsams la/ bdag nyid zhal bzhi po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas gnas par bsgom zhing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bya ste/ 'di ni dang po
261b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// / rje btsun 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul gyis mngon par sangs rgyas te/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba ni mtshan tsam gyis gzhan du gyur pa yin pas na log par
261b2(rgyud 'grel): khong du chud par mi bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang rang gi gnas rnamasu 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gzhog par bya ste/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
261b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya dza dzaHhUM ba~M hoHzhes brjod la/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i
261b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams byon pa dang / zhabs la phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro pos ched du brjod pa'i tshogasu bcad pa brjod ma thag tu bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi la zhugs par bsam mo// de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / ched du brjod pa ni
261b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA ta bAn d+hi nang ge ro m+bi I ma'o byang chub sems dpa' ni/ kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzes
261b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o// de nas nus pa ma lus pa'i// shugs kyis byin gyis brlabs te byung nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs khar zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
262a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing / chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas gnas par bsam mo// de la ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min// rdul
262a2(rgyud 'grel): phran thams cad grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur// de nas rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams rang gi las la yang dag par sbyar nas/ de rnams kyi thugs kha'i zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge'i
262a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba bsams la/ lan bdun nam brgyad kyis bzlas brjod nas/ de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid mchod par gyur par bsam pa 'am/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin/
262a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes mchog tu yang nga rgyal bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thal mo sbyar nas cung zad btud de/ mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstong pa sngon du
262a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'dabs par bdag nyid tshigasu bcad pa 'dis brtag par bya'o// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis// theg pa chen po rtogs pha yis//
262a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yis// cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nas sngags pas yang dag par
262b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa rang gis snying pos mchod yon phul la/ lha rnams kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bya ste/ spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ snying rje chen pos yongs
